00087 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00088 //                                                                UI SYSTEM DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                
00089 //
00090 //    The UI system here decouples event determination from event execution. IN other words,
00091 //    first any user input is gathered and analysed for an event to happen. Once the event is determined,
00092 //    it is then executed. For example, if the left mouse button is used to select a guy, it does not 
00093 //  execute the code to selected the guy, rather it sets a flag to a particular event, in this case
00094 //    the I_SELECT_MERC event is set. The code then executes this event after all input is analysed. In 
00095 //  this way, more than one input method from the user will cause the came event to occur and hence no
00096 //  duplication of code. Also, events have cetain charactoristics. The select merc event is executed just
00097 //  once and then returns to the previous event. Most events are set to run continuously until new
00098 //  input changes to another event. Other events have a 'SNAP-BACK' feature which snap the mouse back to
00099 //  it's position before the event was executed.  Another issue is UI modes. In order to filter out input
00100 //  depending on other flags, for example we do not want to cancel the confirm when a user moves to another 
00101 //    tile unless we are in the 'confirm' mode.  This could be done by flags ( and in effect it is ) where
00102 //  if staements are used, but here at input collection time, we can switch on our current mode to handle
00103 //  input differently based on the mode. Doing it this way also allows us to group certain commands togther
00104 //  like menu commands which are initialized and deleted in the same manner.
00105 //
00106 //    UI_EVENTS
00107 /////////////
00108 //
00109 //    UI_EVENTS have flags to itendtify themselves with special charactoristics, a UI_MODE catagory which
00110 //  signifies the UI mode this event will cause the system to move to. Also, a pointer to a handle function is
00111 //  used to actually handle the particular event. UI_EVENTS also have a couple of param variables and a number
00112 //  of boolean flags used during run-time to determine states of events.
00113 //
00114 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00115 
00116 // LOCAL DEFINES
00117 #define GO_MOVE_ONE                       40
00118 #define GO_MOVE_TWO                       80
00119 #define GO_MOVE_THREE               100

00414 BOOLEAN           gfUIHandlePhysicsTrajectory               = FALSE;
00415 BOOLEAN           gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher                         = FALSE;
00416 UINT8             gubUIValidCatcherID                                         = 0;
00417 
00418 
00419 
00420 BOOLEAN           gfUIConfirmExitArrows                                 = FALSE;
00421 
00422 BOOLEAN           gfUIShowCurIntTile                                          = FALSE;
00423 
00424 BOOLEAN           gfUIWaitingForUserSpeechAdvance           = FALSE;          // Waiting for key input/mouse click to advance speech
00425 BOOLEAN           gfUIKeyCheatModeOn                                                = FALSE;          // Sets cool cheat keys on
00426 BOOLEAN           gfUIAllMoveOn                                                                 = FALSE;          // Sets to all move
00427 BOOLEAN           gfUICanBeginAllMoveCycle                              = FALSE;          // GEts set so we know that the next right-click is a move-call inc\stead of a movement cycle through
00428 
00429 INT16             gsSelectedGridNo                                            = 0;
00430 INT16             gsSelectedLevel                                                   = I_GROUND_LEVEL;
00431 INT16             gsSelectedGuy                                                           = NO_SOLDIER;
00432 
00433 BOOLEAN           gfUIDisplayDamage                                           = FALSE;
00434 INT8              gbDamage                                                                      = 0;
00435 UINT16            gsDamageGridNo                                                    = 0;
00436 
00437 BOOLEAN           gfUIRefreshArrows                                           = FALSE;
00438 
00439 
00440 // Thse flags are not re-set after each frame
00441 BOOLEAN           gfPlotNewMovement                                           = FALSE;
00442 BOOLEAN           gfPlotNewMovementNOCOST                         = FALSE;
00443 UINT32            guiShowUPDownArrows                                         = ARROWS_HIDE_UP | ARROWS_HIDE_DOWN;
00444 INT8              gbAdjustStanceDiff                                          = 0;
00445 INT8              gbClimbID                                                                     = 0;

00448 BOOLEAN           gfUIShowExitWest                                            = FALSE;
00449 BOOLEAN           gfUIShowExitNorth                                           = FALSE;
00450 BOOLEAN           gfUIShowExitSouth                                           = FALSE;
00451 BOOLEAN           gfUIShowExitExitGrid                                  = FALSE;

00459 UINT8 GetAdjustedAnimHeight( UINT8 ubAnimHeight, INT8 bChange );
00460 
00461 void PreventFromTheFreezingBug(SOLDIERTYPE* pSoldier)
00462 {
00463       gfUIInterfaceSetBusy = FALSE;
00464       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
00465       gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
00466       guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00467       UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
00468 }

00470 // MAIN TACTICAL UI HANDLER
00471 UINT32  HandleTacticalUI( void )
00472 {
00473             UINT32 ReturnVal  = GAME_SCREEN;
00474             UINT32 uiNewEvent;      
00475             UINT16                        usMapPos;
00476             LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
00477             static LEVELNODE *pOldIntTile = NULL;
00478 
00479 
00480             // RESET FLAGS
00481             gfUIDisplayActionPoints             = FALSE;
00482             gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid      = FALSE;
00483             gfUIDisplayActionPointsBlack        = FALSE;
00484             gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = FALSE;
00485             gfUIDoNotHighlightSelMerc           = FALSE;
00486             gfUIHandleSelection                       = NO_GUY_SELECTION;
00487             gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy         = FALSE;
00488             gfUIDisplayDamage                   = FALSE;
00489             guiShowUPDownArrows                       = ARROWS_HIDE_UP | ARROWS_HIDE_DOWN;
00490             gfUIBodyHitLocation                       = FALSE;
00491             gfUIIntTileLocation                       = FALSE;
00492             gfUIIntTileLocation2                = FALSE;
00493             //gfUIForceReExamineCursorData      = FALSE;
00494             gfUINewStateForIntTile              = FALSE;
00495             gfUIShowExitExitGrid                = FALSE;
00496             gfUIOverItemPool                    = FALSE;
00497             gfUIHandlePhysicsTrajectory         = FALSE;
00498             gfUIMouseOnValidCatcher             = FALSE;
00499             gfIgnoreOnSelectedGuy           = FALSE;
00500             gTintBulletCounts                   = FALSE;
00501             gfUIAutofireBulletCount             = FALSE;
00502             gfUICtHBar                                = FALSE;
00503 
00504             // Set old event value
00505             guiOldEvent                                     = uiNewEvent = guiCurrentEvent;
00506 
00507             if ( gfUIInterfaceSetBusy )
00508             {
00509                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiUIInterfaceBusyTime ) > 25000 )
00510                   {
00511                         gfUIInterfaceSetBusy = FALSE;
00512 
00513                         //UNLOCK UI
00514                         UnSetUIBusy( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
00515 
00516                         // Decrease global busy  counter...
00517                         gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
00518                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Setting attack busy count to 0 due to ending AI lock" ) );
00519 
00520                         guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00521                         UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
00522                   }
00523             }
00524 
00525             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiUIInterfaceSwapCursorsTime ) > 1000 )
00526             {
00527                   gfOKForExchangeCursor = !gfOKForExchangeCursor;
00528                   guiUIInterfaceSwapCursorsTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00529             }
00530 
00531             // OK, do a check for on an int tile...
00532             pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTile( );
00533 
00534             if ( pIntTile != pOldIntTile )
00535             {
00536                   gfUINewStateForIntTile = TRUE;
00537 
00538                   pOldIntTile = pIntTile;
00539             }
00540 
00541             if ( guiPendingOverrideEvent == I_DO_NOTHING )
00542             {
00543                   // When we are here, guiCurrentEvent is set to the last event
00544                   // Within the input gathering phase, it may change
00545 
00546                   // GATHER INPUT
00547                   // Any new event will overwrite previous events. Therefore,
00548                   // PRIOTITIES GO LIKE THIS:
00549                   //                                  Mouse Movement
00550                   //                                  Keyboard Polling
00551                   //                                  Mouse Buttons
00552                   //                                  Keyboard Queued Events ( will override always )
00553 
00554                   // SWITCH ON INPUT GATHERING, DEPENDING ON MODE
00555                   // IF WE ARE NOT IN COMBAT OR IN REALTIME COMBAT
00556                   if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00557                   {
00558                         // FROM MOUSE POSITION
00559                         GetRTMousePositionInput( &uiNewEvent );
00560                         // FROM KEYBOARD POLLING
00561                         GetPolledKeyboardInput( &uiNewEvent );
00562                         // FROM MOUSE CLICKS
00563                         GetRTMouseButtonInput( &uiNewEvent );                 
00564                         // FROM KEYBOARD
00565                         GetKeyboardInput( &uiNewEvent );
00566 
00567                   }
00568                   else
00569                   {
00570                         // FROM MOUSE POSITION
00571                         GetTBMousePositionInput( &uiNewEvent );
00572                         // FROM KEYBOARD POLLING
00573                         GetPolledKeyboardInput( &uiNewEvent );
00574                         // FROM MOUSE CLICKS
00575                         GetTBMouseButtonInput( &uiNewEvent );                 
00576                         // FROM KEYBOARD
00577                         GetKeyboardInput( &uiNewEvent );
00578                   }
00579 
00580 
00581             }
00582             else
00583             {
00584                   uiNewEvent =      guiPendingOverrideEvent;
00585                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_DO_NOTHING;
00586             }
00587 
00588             if ( HandleItemPickupMenu( ) )
00589             {
00590                   uiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
00591             }
00592 
00593             // Set Current event to new one!
00594             guiCurrentEvent = uiNewEvent;
00595  
00596             //ATE: New! Get flags for over soldier or not...
00597             gfUIFullTargetFound                       = FALSE;
00598             gfUISelectiveTargetFound            = FALSE;
00599 
00600             if ( GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
00601             {
00602                   // Look for soldier full
00603                   if ( FindSoldier( usMapPos, &gusUIFullTargetID, &guiUIFullTargetFlags, ( FINDSOLDIERSAMELEVEL( gsInterfaceLevel ) ) ) )
00604                   {
00605                         gfUIFullTargetFound = TRUE;
00606                   }
00607 
00608                   // Look for soldier selective
00609                   if ( FindSoldier( usMapPos, &gusUISelectiveTargetID, &guiUISelectiveTargetFlags, FINDSOLDIERSELECTIVESAMELEVEL( gsInterfaceLevel ) ) )
00610                   {
00611                         gfUISelectiveTargetFound = TRUE;
00612                   }
00613 
00614             }
00615 
00616 
00617             // Check if current event has changed and clear event if so, to prepare it for execution
00618             // Clearing it does things like set first time flag, param variavles, etc
00619             if ( uiNewEvent != guiOldEvent )
00620             {
00621                   // Snap mouse back if it's that type
00622                   if ( gEvents[ guiOldEvent ].uiFlags & UIEVENT_SNAPMOUSE )
00623                   {
00624                         SimulateMouseMovement( (UINT32)gusSavedMouseX, (UINT32)gusSavedMouseY );
00625                   }
00626 
00627                   ClearEvent( &gEvents[ uiNewEvent ] );
00628             }
00629 
00630             // Restore not scrolling from stance adjust....
00631             if ( gOldUIMode == ADJUST_STANCE_MODE )
00632             {
00633                   gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00634             }
00635 
00636             // IF this event is of type snap mouse, save position
00637             if ( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].uiFlags & UIEVENT_SNAPMOUSE && gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].fFirstTime )
00638             {
00639                    // Save mouse position
00640                    gusSavedMouseX = gusMouseXPos;
00641                    gusSavedMouseY = gusMouseYPos;
00642             }
00643 
00644             // HANDLE UI EVENT
00645             ReturnVal = gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].HandleEvent( &( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ] ) );
00646 
00647       if ( gfInOpenDoorMenu )
00648     {
00649       return( ReturnVal );
00650     }
00651 
00652             // Set first time flag to false, now that it has been executed
00653             gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].fFirstTime = FALSE;
00654 
00655             // Check if UI mode has changed from previous event
00656             if ( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].ChangeToUIMode != gCurrentUIMode && ( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].ChangeToUIMode != DONT_CHANGEMODE ) )
00657             {                 
00658               gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].uiMenuPreviousMode = gCurrentUIMode;
00659 
00660                   gOldUIMode = gCurrentUIMode;
00661 
00662                   gCurrentUIMode = gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].ChangeToUIMode;
00663 
00664                   // CHANGE MODE - DO SPECIAL THINGS IF WE ENTER THIS MODE
00665                   switch( gCurrentUIMode )
00666                   {
00667                         case ACTION_MODE:
00668                               ErasePath( TRUE );
00669                               break;
00670                   }
00671 
00672             }
00673 
00674             // Check if menu event is done and if so set to privious mode
00675             // This is needed to hook into the interface stuff which sets the fDoneMenu flag
00676             if ( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].fDoneMenu == TRUE  )
00677             {
00678                   if ( gCurrentUIMode == MENU_MODE || gCurrentUIMode == POPUP_MODE || gCurrentUIMode == LOOKCURSOR_MODE )
00679                   {
00680                         gCurrentUIMode = (UI_MODE) gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].uiMenuPreviousMode;
00681                   }
00682             }
00683             // Check to return to privious mode
00684             // If the event is a single event, return to previous
00685             if ( gEvents[ uiNewEvent ].uiFlags & UIEVENT_SINGLEEVENT )
00686             {
00687                   // ATE: OK - don't revert to single event if our mouse is not
00688                   // in viewport - rather use m_on_t event
00689                   if ( ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )  )
00690                   {
00691                         guiCurrentEvent = guiOldEvent;
00692                   }
00693                   else
00694                   {
00695                         // ATE: Check first that some modes are met....
00696                         if ( gCurrentUIMode != HANDCURSOR_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != LOOKCURSOR_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != TALKCURSOR_MODE )
00697                         {
00698                               guiCurrentEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
00699                         }
00700                   }
00701             }
00702 
00703             // Donot display APs if not in combat
00704             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) )
00705             {
00706                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00707             }
00708 
00709 
00710             // Will set the cursor but only if different
00711             SetUIMouseCursor( );
00712       
00713             // ATE: Check to reset selected guys....
00714             if ( gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
00715             {
00716                   // If not in MOVE_MODE, CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE, RUBBERBAND_MODE, stop....
00717                   if ( gCurrentUIMode != MOVE_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != RUBBERBAND_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != ADJUST_STANCE_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != TALKCURSOR_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != LOOKCURSOR_MODE )
00718                   {
00719                         ResetMultiSelection( );
00720                   }
00721             }
00722 
00723 
00724             return( ReturnVal );
00725 }
00726 
00727 void SetUIMouseCursor( )
00728 {
00729       UINT32 uiCursorFlags;
00730       UINT32 uiTraverseTimeInMinutes;
00731       BOOLEAN     fForceUpdateNewCursor = FALSE;
00732       BOOLEAN     fUpdateNewCursor = TRUE;
00733       static INT16 sOldExitGridNo = NOWHERE;
00734       static BOOLEAN    fOkForExit = FALSE;
00735 
00736 
00737       // Check if we moved from confirm mode on exit arrows
00738       // If not in move mode, return!
00739       if ( gCurrentUIMode == MOVE_MODE )
00740       {
00741             if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00742             {
00743                   GetCursorMovementFlags( &uiCursorFlags );
00744 
00745                   if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING )
00746                   {
00747                         gfUIConfirmExitArrows = FALSE;
00748                   }
00749             }
00750 
00751 
00752             if ( gfUIShowExitEast )
00753             {
00754                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00755                   ErasePath( TRUE );
00756 
00757                   if ( OKForSectorExit( EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE, 0, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes ) )
00758                   {
00759                         if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00760                         {
00761                               guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_EXIT_EAST_UICURSOR;
00762                         }
00763                         else
00764                         {
00765                               guiNewUICursor = EXIT_EAST_UICURSOR;
00766                         }
00767                   }
00768                   else
00769                   {
00770                         guiNewUICursor = NOEXIT_EAST_UICURSOR;
00771                   }
00772 
00773                   if ( gusMouseXPos < SCREEN_WIDTH - 5 )
00774                   {
00775                         gfUIShowExitEast = FALSE;
00776                   }
00777             }
00778 
00779             if ( gfUIShowExitWest )
00780             {
00781                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00782                   ErasePath( TRUE );
00783 
00784                   if ( OKForSectorExit( WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE, 0, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes ) )
00785                   {
00786                         if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00787                         {
00788                               guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_EXIT_WEST_UICURSOR;
00789                         }
00790                         else
00791                         {
00792                               guiNewUICursor = EXIT_WEST_UICURSOR;
00793                         }
00794                   }
00795                   else
00796                   {
00797                         guiNewUICursor = NOEXIT_WEST_UICURSOR;
00798                   }
00799 
00800                   if ( gusMouseXPos > 5 )
00801                   {
00802                         gfUIShowExitWest = FALSE;
00803                   }
00804             }
00805 
00806             if ( gfUIShowExitNorth )
00807             {
00808                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00809                   ErasePath( TRUE );
00810 
00811                   if ( OKForSectorExit( NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE, 0, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes ) )
00812                   {
00813                         if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00814                         {
00815                               guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_EXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR;
00816                         }
00817                         else
00818                         {
00819                               guiNewUICursor = EXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR;
00820                         }
00821                   }
00822                   else
00823                   {
00824                         guiNewUICursor = NOEXIT_NORTH_UICURSOR;
00825                   }
00826 
00827                   if ( gusMouseYPos > 5 )
00828                   {
00829                         gfUIShowExitNorth = FALSE;
00830                   }
00831             }
00832 
00833 
00834             if ( gfUIShowExitSouth )
00835             {
00836                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00837                   ErasePath( TRUE );
00838 
00839                   if ( OKForSectorExit( SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE, 0, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes ) )
00840                   {
00841                         if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00842                         {
00843                               guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_EXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR;
00844                         }
00845                         else
00846                         {
00847                               guiNewUICursor = EXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR;
00848                         }
00849                   }
00850                   else
00851                   {
00852                         guiNewUICursor = NOEXIT_SOUTH_UICURSOR;
00853                   }
00854 
00855                   if ( gusMouseYPos < SCREEN_HEIGHT - 2 )
00856                   {
00857                         gfUIShowExitSouth = FALSE;
00858 
00859                         // Define region for viewport
00860                         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gViewportRegion );
00861 
00862                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gViewportRegion, 0, 0 ,gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
00863                                                        VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00864 
00865 
00866                         // Adjust where we blit our cursor!
00867                         gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00868                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00869                   }
00870                   else
00871                   {
00872                         if ( gfScrollPending || gfScrollInertia )
00873                         {
00874 
00875                         }
00876                         else
00877                         {
00878                               // Adjust viewport to edge of screen!
00879                               // Define region for viewport
00880                               MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gViewportRegion );
00881                               MSYS_DefineRegion( &gViewportRegion, 0, 0 ,gsVIEWPORT_END_X, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
00882                                                              VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00883 
00884                               gsGlobalCursorYOffset = ( SCREEN_HEIGHT - gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y );
00885                               SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( gUICursors[ guiNewUICursor ].usFreeCursorName );
00886 
00887           gfViewPortAdjustedForSouth = TRUE;
00888 
00889                         }
00890                   }
00891             }
00892     else
00893     {
00894       if ( gfViewPortAdjustedForSouth )
00895       {
00896                         // Define region for viewport
00897                         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gViewportRegion );
00898 
00899                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gViewportRegion, 0, 0 ,gsVIEWPORT_END_X, gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_END_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
00900                                                        VIDEO_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00901 
00902       
00903                         // Adjust where we blit our cursor!
00904                         gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00905                         SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00906 
00907         gfViewPortAdjustedForSouth = FALSE;
00908       }
00909     }
00910 
00911             if ( gfUIShowExitExitGrid )
00912             {
00913                   UINT16 usMapPos;
00914                   UINT8  ubRoomNum;
00915 
00916                   gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
00917                   ErasePath( TRUE );
00918 
00919               if( GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
00920                   {     
00921                         if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bLevel == 0 )
00922                         {
00923                               // ATE: Is this place revealed?
00924                               if ( !InARoom( usMapPos, &ubRoomNum ) || ( InARoom( usMapPos, &ubRoomNum ) && gpWorldLevelData[ usMapPos ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
00925                               {
00926                                     if ( sOldExitGridNo != usMapPos )
00927                                     {
00928                                           fOkForExit         = OKForSectorExit( (INT8)-1, usMapPos, &uiTraverseTimeInMinutes );
00929                                           sOldExitGridNo = usMapPos;
00930                                     }
00931 
00932                                     if ( fOkForExit )
00933                                     {
00934                                           if ( gfUIConfirmExitArrows )
00935                                           {
00936                                                 guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_EXIT_GRID_UICURSOR;
00937                                           }
00938                                           else
00939                                           {
00940                                                 guiNewUICursor = EXIT_GRID_UICURSOR;
00941                                           }
00942                                     }
00943                                     else
00944                                     {
00945                                           guiNewUICursor = NOEXIT_GRID_UICURSOR;
00946                                     }
00947                               }
00948                         }
00949                   }
00950             }
00951             else
00952             {
00953                   sOldExitGridNo = NOWHERE;
00954             }
00955 
00956       }
00957       else
00958       {
00959             gsGlobalCursorYOffset = 0;
00960       }
00961 
00962       if ( gfDisplayTimerCursor )
00963       {
00964             SetUICursor( guiTimerCursorID );
00965 
00966             fUpdateNewCursor = FALSE;
00967 
00968             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiTimerLastUpdate ) > guiTimerCursorDelay )
00969             {
00970                   gfDisplayTimerCursor = FALSE;
00971 
00972                   // OK, timer may be different, update...
00973                   fForceUpdateNewCursor = TRUE;
00974                   fUpdateNewCursor = TRUE;
00975             }
00976       }
00977 
00978       if ( fUpdateNewCursor )
00979       {
00980             if ( !gfTacticalForceNoCursor )
00981             {
00982                   if ( guiNewUICursor != guiCurrentUICursor || fForceUpdateNewCursor )
00983                   {
00984                         SetUICursor( guiNewUICursor );
00985 
00986                         guiCurrentUICursor = guiNewUICursor;
00987                   }
00988             }
00989       }
00990 }
00991 
00992 void SetUIKeyboardHook( UIKEYBOARD_HOOK KeyboardHookFnc )
00993 {
00994       gUIKeyboardHook = KeyboardHookFnc;
00995 }

00998 void ClearEvent( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
00999 {
01000        memset( pUIEvent->uiParams, 0, sizeof( pUIEvent->uiParams ) );
01001        pUIEvent->fDoneMenu                            = FALSE;
01002        pUIEvent->fFirstTime                           = TRUE;
01003        pUIEvent->uiMenuPreviousMode = 0;
01004 
01005 }
01006 
01007 void EndMenuEvent( UINT32     uiEvent )
01008 {
01009       gEvents[ uiEvent ].fDoneMenu = TRUE;
01010 
01011 }

01015 UINT32 UIHandleIDoNothing( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01016 {
01017       guiNewUICursor = NORMAL_SNAPUICURSOR;
01018 
01019       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01020 }

01022 UINT32 UIHandleExit( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01023 {
01024   gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
01025       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01026 }
01027 
01028 UINT32 UIHandleNewMerc( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01029 {
01030        static UINT8                       ubTemp = 3;
01031        INT16                                          usMapPos;
01032    static INT32       iSoldierCount=0;     
01033        MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
01034        INT8       bReturnCode;
01035        SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01036 
01037 
01038        // Get Grid Corrdinates of mouse
01039        if( GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01040        {           
01041              ubTemp+= 2;
01042 
01043                   memset( &HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
01044 
01045                   HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = ubTemp;
01046 
01047                   //DEF: temp
01048                   HireMercStruct.sSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
01049                   HireMercStruct.sSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
01050                   HireMercStruct.bSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
01051                   HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01052                   HireMercStruct.usInsertionData      = usMapPos;
01053                   HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
01054                   HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 7;
01055 
01056                   //specify when the merc should arrive
01057                   HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = 0;
01058 
01059                   //if we succesfully hired the merc
01060                   bReturnCode = HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
01061 
01062                   if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_FAILED )
01063                   {
01064                         ScreenMsg( FONT_ORANGE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Merc hire failed:  Either already hired or dislikes you." );
01065                   }
01066                   else if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_OVER_20_MERCS_HIRED )
01067                   {
01068                         ScreenMsg( FONT_ORANGE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Can't hire more than 20 mercs." );
01069                   }
01070                   else
01071                   {
01072                         // Get soldier from profile
01073                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubTemp, FALSE );
01074 
01075                         MercArrivesCallback( pSoldier->ubID );
01076                         SelectSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
01077                   }
01078 
01079        }
01080        return( GAME_SCREEN );
01081 }
01082 
01083 UINT32 UIHandleNewBadMerc( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01084 {
01085       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01086       UINT16 usMapPos;
01087       UINT16 usRandom;
01088 
01089       //Get map postion and place the enemy there.
01090       if( GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01091       { 
01092             // Are we an OK dest?
01093             if ( !IsLocationSittable( usMapPos, 0 ) )
01094             {
01095                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
01096             }
01097 
01098             usRandom = (UINT16)Random( 10 );
01099             if( usRandom < 4 )
01100                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateAdministrator();
01101             else if( usRandom < 8 )
01102                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateArmyTroop();
01103             else
01104                   pSoldier = TacticalCreateEliteEnemy();
01105 
01106             //Add soldier strategic info, so it doesn't break the counters!
01107             if( pSoldier )
01108             {
01109                   if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
01110                   {
01111                         SECTORINFO *pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) ];
01112                         switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
01113                         {
01114                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   pSector->ubNumAdmins++; pSector->ubAdminsInBattle++; break;
01115                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:                              pSector->ubNumTroops++; pSector->ubTroopsInBattle++; break;
01116                               case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:                             pSector->ubNumElites++; pSector->ubElitesInBattle++; break;
01117                         }
01118                   }
01119                   else
01120                   {
01121                         UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01122                         if( pSector )
01123                         {
01124                               switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
01125                               {
01126                                     case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:   pSector->ubNumAdmins++; pSector->ubAdminsInBattle++; break;
01127                                     case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:                              pSector->ubNumTroops++; pSector->ubTroopsInBattle++; break;
01128                                     case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:                             pSector->ubNumElites++; pSector->ubElitesInBattle++; break;
01129                               }
01130                         }
01131                   }
01132                   
01133                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01134                   pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = usMapPos;
01135                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01136                   AllTeamsLookForAll( NO_INTERRUPTS );
01137             }
01138       }
01139       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01140 }

01156 UINT32 UIHandleEndTurn( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01157 {
01158       // CANCEL FROM PLANNING MODE!
01159       if ( InUIPlanMode( ) )
01160       {
01161             EndUIPlan( );
01162       }
01163 
01164       // ATE: If we have an item pointer end it!
01165       CancelItemPointer( );
01166 
01167       //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ ENDING_TURN ] );
01168 
01169       if ( CheckForEndOfCombatMode( FALSE ) )
01170       {
01171             // do nothing...
01172       }
01173       else
01174       {
01175             if( FileExists( "..\\AutoSave.pls" ) && CanGameBeSaved() )
01176             {
01177                   //Save the game
01178                   guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
01179                   SaveGame( SAVE__END_TURN_NUM, L"End Turn Auto Save" );
01180             }
01181 
01182             // End our turn!
01183             EndTurn( gbPlayerNum + 1 );
01184       }
01185 
01186       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01187 }

01189 
01190 UINT32 UIHandleTestHit( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01191 {
01192       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01193       INT8                                      bDamage;
01194 
01195       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
01196       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01197       {
01198             // Get Soldier
01199             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
01200 
01201             if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
01202             {
01203                   pSoldier->bBreath -= 30;
01204 
01205                   if ( pSoldier->bBreath < 0 )
01206                         pSoldier->bBreath = 0;
01207 
01208                   bDamage = 1;
01209             }
01210             else
01211             {
01212                   if ( Random(2)  )
01213                   {
01214                         bDamage = 20;
01215                   }
01216                   else
01217                   {
01218                         bDamage = 25;
01219                   }
01220             }
01221 
01222             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
01223         
01224              EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pSoldier, 1, bDamage, 10, pSoldier->bDirection, 320, NOBODY , FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL, pSoldier->bAimShotLocation, 0, NOWHERE );
01225             // callahan update end - put everything as it was
01226       }
01227       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01228 }
01229 
01230 void ChangeInterfaceLevel( INT16 sLevel )
01231 {
01232       // Only if different!
01233       if ( sLevel == gsInterfaceLevel )
01234       {
01235             return;
01236       }
01237 
01238       gsInterfaceLevel = sLevel;
01239 
01240       if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 1 )
01241       {
01242             gsRenderHeight += ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
01243             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= SHOW_ALL_ROOFS;
01244             InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
01245       }
01246       else if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 0 )
01247       {
01248             gsRenderHeight -= ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
01249             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~SHOW_ALL_ROOFS );
01250             InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
01251       }
01252 
01253       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
01254       // Remove any interactive tiles we could be over!
01255       BeginCurInteractiveTileCheck( INTILE_CHECK_SELECTIVE );
01256       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01257   ErasePath(FALSE);
01258 }
01259 
01260 
01261 UINT32 UIHandleChangeLevel( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01262 {
01263       if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 0 )
01264       {
01265             ChangeInterfaceLevel( 1 );
01266       }
01267       else if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 1 )
01268       {
01269             ChangeInterfaceLevel( 0 );
01270       }
01271 
01272       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01273 }

01278 UINT32 UIHandleSelectMerc( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01279 {
01280       INT32 iCurrentSquad;
01281 
01282       // Get merc index at mouse and set current selection
01283       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01284       {
01285              iCurrentSquad = CurrentSquad( );
01286 
01287              InternalSelectSoldier( gusUIFullTargetID, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE );
01288 
01289              // If different, display message
01290              if ( CurrentSquad( ) != iCurrentSquad )
01291              {
01292                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SQUAD_ACTIVE ], ( CurrentSquad( ) + 1 ) );
01293              }
01294       }
01295 
01296       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01297 }

01300 
01301 UINT32 UIHandleMOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01302 {
01303       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01304       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01305       BOOLEAN                                   fSetCursor = FALSE;
01306       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
01307       LEVELNODE                           *pIntNode;
01308       EXITGRID                            ExitGrid;
01309       INT16                                     sIntTileGridNo;
01310       BOOLEAN                                   fContinue = TRUE;
01311       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
01312 
01313       static INT16                  sGridNoForItemsOver;
01314       static INT8                   bLevelForItemsOver;
01315       static UINT32                 uiItemsOverTimer;
01316       static BOOLEAN          fOverItems;
01317 
01318       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01319       {
01320             return( GAME_SCREEN );
01321       }
01322 
01323       gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver = FALSE;
01324 
01325       // If we are a vehicle..... just show an X
01326       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
01327       {
01328             if ( ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pSoldier ) ) )
01329             {
01330                   if ( !UIHandleOnMerc( TRUE ) )
01331                   {
01332                         guiNewUICursor = FLOATING_X_UICURSOR;                       
01333                         return( GAME_SCREEN );
01334                   }
01335             }
01336       }
01337 
01338       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
01339       if ( !UIHandleOnMerc( TRUE ) )
01340       {
01341              // Are we over items...
01342              if ( GetItemPool( usMapPos, &pItemPool, (UINT8)gsInterfaceLevel ) && ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) )
01343              {
01344                         // Are we already in...
01345                     if ( fOverItems )
01346                         {
01347                               // Is this the same level & gridno...
01348                               if ( gsInterfaceLevel == (INT16)bLevelForItemsOver && usMapPos == sGridNoForItemsOver )
01349                               {
01350                                     // Check timer...
01351                                     if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - uiItemsOverTimer ) > 1500 )
01352                                     {
01353                                           // Change to hand curso mode
01354                                           guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_HANDMODE;
01355                                           gsOverItemsGridNo                   = usMapPos;
01356                                           gsOverItemsLevel                    = gsInterfaceLevel;
01357                                           fOverItems = FALSE;
01358                                     }
01359                               }
01360                               else
01361                               {
01362                                     uiItemsOverTimer = GetJA2Clock( );
01363                                     bLevelForItemsOver = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
01364                                     sGridNoForItemsOver = usMapPos;
01365                               }
01366                         }
01367                         else
01368                         {
01369                               fOverItems = TRUE;
01370 
01371                               uiItemsOverTimer = GetJA2Clock( );
01372                               bLevelForItemsOver = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
01373                               sGridNoForItemsOver = usMapPos;
01374                         }
01375              }
01376              else
01377              {
01378                   fOverItems = FALSE;
01379              }
01380 
01381 
01382              if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
01383              {
01384    
01385        if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == NOWHERE )
01386        {
01387           int i = 0;
01388        }
01389 
01390                    if ( GetExitGrid( usMapPos, &ExitGrid ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
01391                    {
01392                          gfUIShowExitExitGrid = TRUE;
01393                    }
01394 
01395                    // ATE: Draw invalidc cursor if heights different
01396                    if ( gpWorldLevelData[ usMapPos ].sHeight != gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight )
01397                    {
01398                               // ERASE PATH
01399                               ErasePath( TRUE );
01400 
01401                               guiNewUICursor = FLOATING_X_UICURSOR;                       
01402 
01403                               return( GAME_SCREEN );
01404                    }
01405              }
01406 
01407              // DO SOME CURSOR POSITION FLAGS SETTING
01408              GetCursorMovementFlags( &uiCursorFlags );
01409 
01410              if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01411              {
01412                   // Get Soldier Pointer
01413                   GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
01414 
01415                   // Get interactvie tile node
01416                   pIntNode = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNo( &sIntTileGridNo );
01417 
01418                   // Check were we are
01419                   // CHECK IF WE CAN MOVE HERE
01420                   // THIS IS JUST A CRUDE TEST FOR NOW
01421                   if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
01422                   {
01423         UINT8 ubID;
01424                         // Show reg. cursor
01425                         // GO INTO IDLE MODE
01426                         // guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_CHANGE_TO_IDLE;
01427                         // gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER; 
01428             ubID = FindNextActiveAndAliveMerc( pSoldier, FALSE, FALSE ); 
01429 
01430         if ( ubID != NOBODY )
01431         {
01432             SelectSoldier( (INT16)ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
01433         }
01434         else
01435         {
01436                   gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;
01437                   // Change UI mode to reflact that we are selected
01438                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_ON_TERRAIN;
01439         }
01440                   }
01441                   else if ( ( UIOKMoveDestination( pSoldier, usMapPos ) != 1 ) && pIntNode == NULL )
01442                   {
01443                         // ERASE PATH
01444                         ErasePath( TRUE );
01445 
01446                         guiNewUICursor = CANNOT_MOVE_UICURSOR;                      
01447 
01448                   }
01449                   else
01450                   {
01451                         if ( !UIHandleInteractiveTilesAndItemsOnTerrain( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE, TRUE ) )
01452                         {
01453                               // Are we in combat?
01454                               if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) )
01455                               {
01456                                     // If so, draw path, etc
01457                                     fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, usMapPos, 0 );
01458                               }
01459                               else
01460                               {
01461                                     // Donot draw path until confirm
01462                                     fSetCursor = TRUE;
01463 
01464                                     // If so, draw path, etc
01465                                     fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, usMapPos, 0 );
01466 
01467                                     //ErasePath( TRUE );
01468                               }
01469 
01470                         }
01471                         else
01472                         {
01473                               fSetCursor = TRUE;
01474                         }
01475                   }
01476             }
01477             else
01478             {
01479                   // IF GUSSELECTEDSOLDIER != NOSOLDIER
01480                   guiNewUICursor = NORMAL_SNAPUICURSOR;
01481             }
01482       }
01483       else
01484       {
01485             if( ValidQuickExchangePosition( ) )
01486             {
01487                   // Do new cursor!
01488                   guiNewUICursor = EXCHANGE_PLACES_UICURSOR;
01489             }
01490       }
01491 
01492 
01493       {
01494                                                 
01495             //if ( fSetCursor && guiNewUICursor != ENTER_VEHICLE_UICURSOR )
01496             if ( fSetCursor && !gfBeginVehicleCursor )
01497             {
01498                   SetMovementModeCursor( pSoldier );
01499             }
01500       }
01501 
01502       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01503 }
01504 
01505 UINT32 UIHandleMovementMenu( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01506 {
01507       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01508 
01509 
01510       // Get soldier
01511       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
01512       {
01513             return( GAME_SCREEN );
01514       }
01515 
01516       // Popup Menu
01517       if ( pUIEvent->fFirstTime )
01518       {
01519              //Pop-up menu
01520              PopupMovementMenu( pUIEvent );
01521 
01522              // Change cusror to normal
01523              guiNewUICursor = NORMAL_FREEUICURSOR;
01524 
01525       }
01526 
01527       // Check for done flag
01528       if ( pUIEvent->fDoneMenu )
01529       {
01530                   PopDownMovementMenu( );
01531                   
01532                   // Excecute command, if user hit a button
01533                   if ( pUIEvent->uiParams[1] == TRUE )
01534                   {
01535                         if ( pUIEvent->uiParams[ 2 ] == MOVEMENT_MENU_LOOK )
01536                         {
01537                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = LC_CHANGE_TO_LOOK;
01538                         }
01539                         else if ( pUIEvent->uiParams[ 2 ] == MOVEMENT_MENU_HAND )
01540                         {
01541                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = HC_ON_TERRAIN;
01542                         }
01543                         else if ( pUIEvent->uiParams[ 2 ] == MOVEMENT_MENU_ACTIONC )
01544                         {
01545                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_ACTION;
01546                         }
01547                         else if ( pUIEvent->uiParams[ 2 ] == MOVEMENT_MENU_TALK )
01548                         {
01549                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = T_CHANGE_TO_TALKING;
01550                         }
01551                         else
01552                         {
01553                               // Change stance based on params!
01554                               switch( pUIEvent->uiParams[ 0 ] )
01555                               {
01556                                     case MOVEMENT_MENU_RUN:
01557 
01558                                           if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode != WALKING && pSoldier->usUIMovementMode != RUNNING )
01559                                           {
01560                                                 UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ANIM_STAND );
01561                                                 pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = 1;
01562                                           }
01563                                           else
01564                                           {
01565                                                  pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = 1;
01566                                                  pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
01567                                                  gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01568                                           }
01569                                           break;
01570 
01571                                     case MOVEMENT_MENU_WALK:
01572 
01573                                           UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ANIM_STAND );
01574                                           break;
01575 
01576                                     case MOVEMENT_MENU_SWAT:
01577 
01578                                           UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ANIM_CROUCH );
01579                                           break;
01580 
01581                                     case MOVEMENT_MENU_PRONE:
01582 
01583                                           UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ANIM_PRONE );
01584                                           break;
01585                                           
01586                               }
01587                         
01588                               guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01589 
01590                               //pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = (INT8)pUIEvent->uiParams[ 0 ];
01591                         }
01592 
01593                   }
01594       }
01595 
01596       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01597 }

01607 UINT32 UIHandleAOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01608 {
01609       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01610       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01611 //    INT16                                     sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos;
01612        DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("UIHandleAOnTerrain"));
01613 
01614       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01615       {
01616             return( GAME_SCREEN );
01617       }
01618 
01619       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01620       {
01621             return( GAME_SCREEN );        
01622       }
01623 
01624       // Get soldier to determine range
01625       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
01626       {
01627              // ATE: Add stuff here to display a system message if we are targeting smeothing and
01628              //  are out of range.
01629              // Are we using a gun?
01630              if ( GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier ) == TARGETCURS )
01631              {
01632                    SetActionModeDoorCursorText( );
01633 
01634                    // Yep, she's a gun.
01635                    // Are we in range?
01636                    if ( !InRange( pSoldier, usMapPos ) )
01637                    {
01638                          // Are we over a guy?
01639                          if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
01640                          {
01641                                     // No, ok display message IF this is the first time at this gridno
01642                                     if ( gsOutOfRangeGridNo != MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo || gubOutOfRangeMerc != gusSelectedSoldier )
01643                                     {
01644                                           // Display
01645                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ OUT_OF_RANGE_STRING ] );
01646 
01647              //PlayJA2Sample( TARGET_OUT_OF_RANGE, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                           
01648 
01649                                           // Set
01650                                           gsOutOfRangeGridNo = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
01651                                           gubOutOfRangeMerc  = (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier;
01652                                     }
01653                          }
01654                    }
01655 
01656              }
01657 
01658          guiNewUICursor = GetProperItemCursor( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier, pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem, usMapPos, FALSE );
01659 
01660               // Show UI ON GUY
01661               UIHandleOnMerc( FALSE );
01662 
01663                   // If we are in realtime, and in a stationary animation, follow!
01664                   if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01665                   {
01666                         if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY && pSoldier->ubPendingAction == NO_PENDING_ACTION )
01667                         {                       
01668                                // Check if we have a shot waiting!
01669                                if ( gUITargetShotWaiting )
01670                                {
01671                                           guiPendingOverrideEvent = CA_MERC_SHOOT;
01672                                }
01673 
01674                                if ( !gUITargetReady )
01675                                {                      
01676                                           // Move to proper stance + direction!
01677                                           // Convert our grid-not into an XY
01678                                     //    ConvertGridNoToXY( usMapPos, &sTargetXPos, &sTargetYPos );
01679 
01680                                           // Ready weapon
01681                               //          SoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos, FALSE );
01682 
01683                                           gUITargetReady = TRUE;
01684                                }
01685 
01686             
01687 
01688                         }
01689                         else
01690                         {
01691                               gUITargetReady = FALSE;
01692                         }
01693                   }
01694 
01695 
01696       }
01697 
01698       
01699       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01700 
01701 }

01734 UINT32 UIHandleCWait( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01735 {
01736       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01737       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01738       BOOLEAN                                   fSetCursor;
01739       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
01740       LEVELNODE                           *pInvTile;
01741 
01742       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01743       {
01744             return( GAME_SCREEN );
01745       }
01746 
01747       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
01748       {
01749                   pInvTile = GetCurInteractiveTile( );
01750 
01751                   if ( pInvTile && gpInvTileThatCausedMoveConfirm != pInvTile )
01752                   {
01753                         // Get out og this mode...
01754                         guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
01755                         return( GAME_SCREEN );
01756                   }
01757 
01758                   GetCursorMovementFlags( &uiCursorFlags );
01759 
01760                   if ( pInvTile != NULL )
01761                   {
01762 
01763                         fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, usMapPos, MOVEUI_TARGET_INTTILES );
01764 
01765                         //Set UI CURSOR
01766                         guiNewUICursor = GetInteractiveTileCursor( guiNewUICursor, TRUE  );
01767 
01768                         // Make red tile under spot... if we've previously found one...
01769                         if ( gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid )
01770                         {
01771                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = 2;
01772                         }
01773 
01774 
01775                         return( GAME_SCREEN );
01776                   }
01777 
01778               // Display action points
01779               gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
01780 
01781               // Determine if we can afford!
01782               if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
01783                   {  
01784                     gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
01785                   }
01786 
01787               SetConfirmMovementModeCursor( pSoldier, FALSE );
01788 
01789                   // If we are not in combat, draw path here!
01790                   if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01791                   {
01792                         //DrawUIMovementPath( pSoldier, usMapPos,  0 );
01793                         fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, usMapPos, 0 );
01794                   }
01795 
01796       }
01797 
01798       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01799 }
01800 
01801 
01802 // NOTE, ONCE AT THIS FUNCTION, WE HAVE ASSUMED TO HAVE CHECKED FOR ENOUGH APS THROUGH
01803 // SelectedMercCanAffordMove
01804 UINT32 UIHandleCMoveMerc( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01805 {
01806       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
01807       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
01808       INT16                                     sDestGridNo;
01809       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
01810       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;
01811       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
01812       BOOLEAN                                   fAllMove;
01813       INT8                                      bLoop;
01814       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
01815       INT16                                     sIntTileGridNo;
01816       BOOLEAN                                   fOldFastMove;
01817                                     
01818       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
01819       {
01820             fAllMove = gfUIAllMoveOn;
01821             gfUIAllMoveOn = FALSE;
01822                               
01823             if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
01824             {
01825                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
01826             }
01827 
01828             // ERASE PATH
01829             ErasePath( TRUE );
01830 
01831             if ( fAllMove )
01832             {
01833                   gfGetNewPathThroughPeople = TRUE;
01834 
01835                   // Loop through all mercs and make go!
01836                   // TODO: Only our squad!
01837                   for (bLoop=gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bFirstID, pSoldier=MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[gbPlayerNum].bLastID; bLoop++, pSoldier++)
01838                   {
01839                         if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) && !pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
01840                         {     
01841               // If we can't be controlled, returninvalid...
01842               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
01843               {
01844                     if ( !CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
01845             {
01846               continue;
01847             }
01848           }
01849 
01850                               AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
01851 
01852                               fOldFastMove = pSoldier->fUIMovementFast;
01853 
01854                               if ( fAllMove == 2 )
01855                               {
01856                                     pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = TRUE;
01857                                     pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
01858                               }
01859                               else
01860                               {
01861                                     pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = FALSE;
01862                                     pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
01863                               }
01864 
01865                               // Remove any previous actions
01866                               pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01867 
01868 
01869                               //if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) )
01870                               //{
01871                               //    pSoldier->sRTPendingMovementGridNo = usMapPos;
01872                               //    pSoldier->usRTPendingMovementAnim  = pSoldier->usUIMovementMode;
01873                               //}
01874                               //else                              
01875                               if ( EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, usMapPos, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, TRUE, FALSE ) )
01876                               {
01877                                     InternalDoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_OK1, BATTLE_SND_LOWER_VOLUME );
01878                               }
01879                               else
01880                               {
01881                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH_FOR_MERC ], pSoldier->name );
01882                               }                             
01883 
01884                               pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = fOldFastMove;
01885 
01886                         }
01887                   }
01888                   gfGetNewPathThroughPeople = FALSE;
01889 
01890                   // RESET MOVE FAST FLAG
01891                   SetConfirmMovementModeCursor( pSoldier, TRUE );
01892 
01893                   gfUIAllMoveOn = 0;
01894 
01895             }
01896             else
01897             {
01898                   // Get soldier
01899                   if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
01900                   {
01901                         // FOR REALTIME - DO MOVEMENT BASED ON STANCE!
01902                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01903                         {
01904                               pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
01905                         }
01906 
01907 
01908                         sDestGridNo = usMapPos;
01909 
01910 
01911                         // Get structure info for in tile!
01912                         pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo, &pStructure );
01913 
01914                         // We should not have null here if we are given this flag...
01915                         if ( pIntTile != NULL )
01916                         {
01917                               sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sIntTileGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
01918                               if ( sActionGridNo != -1 )
01919                               {
01920                                     SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01921 
01922                                     // Set dest gridno
01923                                     sDestGridNo = sActionGridNo;
01924 
01925                                     // check if we are at this location
01926                                     if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sDestGridNo )
01927                                     {
01928                                            StartInteractiveObject( sIntTileGridNo, pStructure->usStructureID, pSoldier, ubDirection );
01929                                            InteractWithInteractiveObject( pSoldier, pStructure, ubDirection );
01930                                            return( GAME_SCREEN );
01931                                     }
01932                               }
01933                               else
01934                               {
01935                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
01936                                     return( GAME_SCREEN );
01937                               }
01938                         }
01939 
01940                         SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01941 
01942                         if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01943                         {
01944                               // RESET MOVE FAST FLAG
01945                               SetConfirmMovementModeCursor( pSoldier, TRUE );
01946 
01947                               if ( !gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
01948                               {
01949                                     pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = FALSE;
01950                               }
01951 
01952                               //StartLooseCursor( usMapPos, 0 );
01953                         }
01954 
01955                         if ( gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect && pIntTile == NULL )
01956                         {
01957                               HandleMultiSelectionMove( sDestGridNo );
01958                         }
01959                         else
01960                         {
01961 
01962                               if ( gUIUseReverse )
01963                               {
01964                                     pSoldier->bReverse = TRUE;
01965                               }
01966                               else
01967                               {
01968                                     pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
01969                               }
01970 
01971                               // Remove any previous actions
01972                               pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01973 
01974                               {
01975                                     EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode , TRUE, pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove );
01976                               }
01977 
01978                               if ( pSoldier->usPathDataSize > 5 )
01979                               {
01980                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_OK1 );
01981                               }
01982 
01983                               // HANDLE ANY INTERACTIVE OBJECTS HERE!
01984                               if ( pIntTile != NULL )
01985                               {
01986                                     StartInteractiveObject( sIntTileGridNo, pStructure->usStructureID, pSoldier, ubDirection );
01987                               }
01988                         }
01989                   }
01990             }
01991       }
01992       return( GAME_SCREEN );
01993 }

01995 UINT32 UIHandleMCycleMoveAll( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
01996 {
01997       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01998 
01999        if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
02000        {
02001              return( GAME_SCREEN );
02002        }
02003 
02004        if ( gfUICanBeginAllMoveCycle )
02005        {
02006                   gfUIAllMoveOn                                         = TRUE;
02007                   gfUICanBeginAllMoveCycle      = FALSE;
02008        }
02009        return( GAME_SCREEN );
02010 }

02012 
02013 UINT32 UIHandleMCycleMovement( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
02014 {
02015       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02016       BOOLEAN                 fGoodMode = FALSE;
02017 
02018        if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
02019        {
02020              return( GAME_SCREEN );
02021        }
02022 
02023        gfUIAllMoveOn                                        = FALSE;
02024 
02025    if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON )
02026    {
02027              pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;     
02028        gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
02029          return( GAME_SCREEN );
02030    }
02031    
02032        do
02033        {
02034              // Cycle gmovement state
02035              if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == RUNNING )
02036              {
02037                    pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;
02038                    if ( IsValidMovementMode( pSoldier, WALKING ) )
02039                    {
02040                               fGoodMode = TRUE;
02041                    }
02042              }
02043              else if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == WALKING )
02044              {
02045                    pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = SWATTING;
02046                    if ( IsValidMovementMode( pSoldier, SWATTING ) )
02047                    {
02048                          fGoodMode = TRUE;
02049                    }
02050              }
02051              else if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == SWATTING )
02052              {
02053                    pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = CRAWLING;
02054                    if ( IsValidMovementMode( pSoldier, CRAWLING ) )
02055                    {
02056                          fGoodMode = TRUE;
02057                    }
02058              }
02059              else if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == CRAWLING )
02060              {
02061                    pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = 1;
02062                    pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
02063                    if ( IsValidMovementMode( pSoldier, RUNNING ) )
02064                    {
02065                          fGoodMode = TRUE;
02066                    }
02067              }
02068 
02069        } while( fGoodMode != TRUE );
02070       
02071       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
02072 
02073 
02074        return( GAME_SCREEN );
02075 }

02078 {
02079 
02080       return( GAME_SCREEN );
02081 }
