02083 
02084 UINT32 UIHandleMAdjustStanceMode( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
02085 {
02086       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02087       BOOLEAN                                   fCheck = FALSE;
02088       INT32                                     iPosDiff;
02089       static UINT16                 gusAnchorMouseY;
02090       static UINT16                 usOldMouseY;
02091       static BOOLEAN          ubNearHeigherLevel;
02092       static BOOLEAN          ubNearLowerLevel;
02093       static UINT8                  ubUpHeight, ubDownDepth;
02094       static UINT32                 uiOldShowUPDownArrows;
02095       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
02096 
02097   // Change cusror to normal
02098   guiNewUICursor = NO_UICURSOR;
02099 
02100 
02101       if ( pUIEvent->fFirstTime )
02102       {
02103             gusAnchorMouseY = gusMouseYPos;
02104             usOldMouseY = gusMouseYPos;
02105             ubNearHeigherLevel = FALSE;
02106             ubNearLowerLevel = FALSE;
02107 
02108             guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BESIDE | ARROWS_SHOW_UP_BESIDE;
02109             uiOldShowUPDownArrows = guiShowUPDownArrows;
02110 
02111             gbAdjustStanceDiff = 0;
02112             gbClimbID                            = 0;
02113 
02114             gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
02115 
02116             // Get soldier current height of animation
02117             if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02118             {
02119                   // IF we are on a basic level...(temp)
02120                   if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02121                   {
02122                         if ( FindHeigherLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) )
02123                         {
02124                               ubNearHeigherLevel = TRUE;
02125                         }
02126                   }
02127 
02128                   // IF we are higher...
02129                   if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
02130                   {
02131                         if ( FindLowerLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) )
02132                         {
02133                               ubNearLowerLevel = TRUE;
02134                         }
02135                   }
02136 
02137                   switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
02138                   {
02139                         case ANIM_STAND:
02140                               if ( ubNearHeigherLevel )
02141                               {
02142                                     ubUpHeight  = 1;
02143                                     ubDownDepth = 2;
02144                               }
02145                               else if ( ubNearLowerLevel )
02146                               {
02147                                     ubUpHeight  = 0;
02148                                     ubDownDepth = 3;
02149                               }
02150                               else
02151                               {
02152                                     ubUpHeight  = 0;
02153                                     ubDownDepth = 2;
02154                               }
02155                               break;
02156 
02157                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
02158                               if ( ubNearHeigherLevel )
02159                               {
02160                                     ubUpHeight  = 2;
02161                                     ubDownDepth = 1;
02162                               }
02163                               else if ( ubNearLowerLevel )
02164                               {
02165                                     ubUpHeight  = 1;
02166                                     ubDownDepth = 2;
02167                               }
02168                               else
02169                               {
02170                                     ubUpHeight  = 1;
02171                                     ubDownDepth = 1;
02172                               }
02173                               break;
02174 
02175                         case ANIM_PRONE:
02176                               if ( ubNearHeigherLevel )
02177                               {
02178                                     ubUpHeight  = 3;
02179                                     ubDownDepth = 0;
02180                               }
02181                               else if ( ubNearLowerLevel )
02182                               {
02183                                     ubUpHeight  = 2;
02184                                     ubDownDepth = 1;
02185                               }
02186                               else
02187                               {
02188                                     ubUpHeight  = 2;
02189                                     ubDownDepth = 0;
02190                               }
02191                               break;
02192                   }                 
02193 
02194 
02195             }
02196 
02197       }
02198 
02199       // Check if delta X has changed alot since last time
02200       iPosDiff = abs( (INT32)( usOldMouseY - gusMouseYPos) );
02201 
02202       //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BESIDE | ARROWS_SHOW_UP_BESIDE;
02203       guiShowUPDownArrows = uiOldShowUPDownArrows;
02204 
02205       {
02206             if ( gusAnchorMouseY > gusMouseYPos )
02207             {
02208                   // Get soldier
02209                   if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02210                   {
02211                               if ( iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_ONE && ubUpHeight >= 1 )
02212                               {
02213                                     // Change arrows to move down arrow + show
02214                                     //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_Y;
02215                                     guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BESIDE | ARROWS_SHOW_UP_BESIDE;
02216                                     gbAdjustStanceDiff = 0;
02217                                     gbClimbID                            = 0;
02218                               }     
02219                               else if ( iPosDiff > GO_MOVE_ONE && iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_TWO && ubUpHeight >= 1 )
02220                               {
02221                                     //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_G;
02222                                     if ( ubUpHeight == 1 && ubNearHeigherLevel )
02223                                     {
02224                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_CLIMB;
02225                                           gbClimbID                             = 1;
02226                                     }
02227                                     else
02228                                     {
02229                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_Y;
02230                                           gbClimbID                             = 0;
02231                                     }
02232                                     gbAdjustStanceDiff = 1;
02233                               }
02234                               else if ( iPosDiff >= GO_MOVE_TWO && iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_THREE && ubUpHeight >= 2 )
02235                               {
02236                                     if ( ubUpHeight == 2 && ubNearHeigherLevel )
02237                                     {
02238                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_CLIMB;
02239                                           gbClimbID                            = 1;
02240                                     }
02241                                     else
02242                                     {
02243                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_YY;
02244                                           gbClimbID                            = 0;
02245                                     }
02246                                     gbAdjustStanceDiff = 2;
02247                               }
02248                               else if ( iPosDiff >= GO_MOVE_THREE && ubUpHeight >= 3 )
02249                               {
02250                                     if ( ubUpHeight == 3 && ubNearHeigherLevel )
02251                                     {
02252                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_UP_ABOVE_CLIMB;
02253                                           gbClimbID                            = 1;
02254                                     }
02255                               }
02256                   }
02257 
02258             }
02259       
02260             if ( gusAnchorMouseY < gusMouseYPos )
02261             {
02262 
02263                   // Get soldier
02264                   if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02265                   {
02266                               if ( iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_ONE && ubDownDepth >= 1 )
02267                               {
02268                                     // Change arrows to move down arrow + show
02269                                     //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_Y;
02270                                     guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BESIDE | ARROWS_SHOW_UP_BESIDE;
02271                                     gbAdjustStanceDiff = 0;
02272                                     gbClimbID                            = 0;
02273 
02274                               }     
02275                               else if ( iPosDiff >= GO_MOVE_ONE && iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_TWO && ubDownDepth >= 1 )
02276                               {
02277 //                                  guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_G;
02278                                           if ( ubDownDepth == 1 && ubNearLowerLevel )
02279                                           {
02280                                                 guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_CLIMB;
02281                                                 gbClimbID                            = -1;
02282                                           }
02283                                           else
02284                                           {
02285                                                 guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_Y;
02286                                                 gbClimbID                            = 0;
02287                                           }
02288                                           gbAdjustStanceDiff = -1;
02289                               }
02290                               else if ( iPosDiff > GO_MOVE_TWO && iPosDiff < GO_MOVE_THREE && ubDownDepth >= 2 )
02291                               {
02292                                     //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_GG;
02293                                     if ( ubDownDepth == 2 && ubNearLowerLevel )
02294                                     {
02295                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_CLIMB;
02296                                           gbClimbID                            = -1;
02297                                     }
02298                                     else
02299                                     {
02300                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_YY;
02301                                           gbClimbID                            = 0;
02302                                     }
02303                                     gbAdjustStanceDiff = -2;
02304                               }
02305                               else if ( iPosDiff > GO_MOVE_THREE && ubDownDepth >= 3 )
02306                               {
02307                                     //guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BELOW_GG;
02308                                     if ( ubDownDepth == 3 && ubNearLowerLevel )
02309                                     {
02310                                           guiShowUPDownArrows = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_CLIMB;
02311                                           gbClimbID                            = -1;
02312                                     }
02313                               }
02314 
02315                   }
02316 
02317             }
02318 
02319       }
02320 
02321       uiOldShowUPDownArrows = guiShowUPDownArrows;
02322 
02323       return( GAME_SCREEN );
02324 }

02364 
02365 void UIHandleMercAttack( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier , SOLDIERTYPE *pTargetSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos )
02366 {
02367       INT32                                     iHandleReturn;
02368       INT16                                     sTargetGridNo;
02369       INT8                                      bTargetLevel;
02370       UINT16                                    usItem;
02371       LEVELNODE                           *pIntNode;
02372       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;
02373       INT16                                     sGridNo, sNewGridNo;
02374   UINT8             ubItemCursor;
02375   
02376   // get cursor
02377   ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
02378 
02379       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && pTargetSoldier && Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
02380       {
02381             if ( NPCFirstDraw( pSoldier, pTargetSoldier ) )
02382             {
02383                   // go into turnbased for that person
02384                   CancelAIAction( pTargetSoldier, TRUE );               
02385                   AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pTargetSoldier->ubID );
02386                   //MakeCivHostile( pTargetSoldier, 2 );
02387                   //TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( pTargetSoldier->ubProfile );
02388                   return;
02389             }
02390       }
02391 
02392       // Set aim time to one in UI
02393       pSoldier->bAimTime                  = (pSoldier->bShownAimTime );
02394       usItem                                                      = pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
02395 
02396       // ATE: Check if we are targeting an interactive tile, and adjust gridno accordingly...
02397       pIntNode = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sGridNo, &pStructure );
02398 
02399       if ( pTargetSoldier != NULL )
02400       {
02401             sTargetGridNo           = pTargetSoldier->sGridNo;
02402             bTargetLevel        = pTargetSoldier->bLevel;
02403       }
02404       else
02405       {
02406             sTargetGridNo = usMapPos;
02407             bTargetLevel  = (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel;
02408 
02409             if ( pIntNode != NULL )
02410             {
02411                   // Change gridno....
02412                   sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
02413             }
02414       }
02415 
02416   // here, change gridno if we're targeting ourselves....
02417       if ( pIntNode != NULL  )
02418       {
02419     // Are we in the same gridno?
02420     if ( sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo && ubItemCursor != AIDCURS )
02421     {
02422       // Get orientation....
02423                   switch( pStructure->ubWallOrientation )
02424                   {
02425                         case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
02426                         case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
02427 
02428                                     sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
02429                                     break;
02430 
02431                         case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
02432                         case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
02433 
02434                                     sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
02435                                     break;
02436 
02437                         default:
02438             sNewGridNo = sGridNo;
02439       }
02440 
02441       // Set target gridno to this one...
02442       sTargetGridNo = sNewGridNo;
02443 
02444       // now set target cube height
02445       // CJC says to hardcode this value :)
02446       pSoldier->bTargetCubeLevel = 2;
02447     }
02448     else
02449     {
02450       // ATE: Refine this a bit - if we have nobody as a target...
02451       if ( pTargetSoldier == NULL )
02452       {
02453         sTargetGridNo = sGridNo;
02454       }
02455     }
02456       }
02457 
02458 
02459       // Cannot be fire if we are already in a fire animation....
02460       // this is to stop the shooting trigger/happy duded from contiously pressing fire...
02461       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02462       {
02463             if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_FIRE )
02464             {
02465                   return;
02466             }
02467       }
02468  
02469       // If in turn-based mode - return to movement
02470       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02471       {
02472             // Reset some flags for cont move...
02473             pSoldier->sFinalDestination = pSoldier->sGridNo;
02474             pSoldier->bGoodContPath             = FALSE;
02475       //  guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
02476       }     
02477 
02478 
02479       if (pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO )
02480       {
02481             iHandleReturn = HandleItem( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, bTargetLevel, GetAttachedGrenadeLauncher(&pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ]), TRUE );
02482       }
02483       else
02484       {
02485             iHandleReturn = HandleItem( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, bTargetLevel, pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem, TRUE );
02486       }
02487 
02488       if ( iHandleReturn < 0 )
02489       {
02490             if ( iHandleReturn == ITEM_HANDLE_RELOADING )
02491             {
02492                   guiNewUICursor = ACTION_TARGET_RELOADING;
02493                   return;
02494             }
02495 
02496             if ( iHandleReturn == ITEM_HANDLE_NOROOM )
02497             {
02498                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CANT_FIRE_HERE ] );
02499                   return;
02500             }
02501       }
02502 
02503 
02504       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02505       {
02506             HandleUICursorRTFeedback( pSoldier );
02507       }     
02508 
02509       gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = TRUE;
02510 }
02511 
02512 void AttackRequesterCallback( UINT8 bExitValue )
02513 {
02514       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
02515       {
02516             gTacticalStatus.ubLastRequesterTargetID = gpRequesterTargetMerc->ubProfile;
02517 
02518             UIHandleMercAttack( gpRequesterMerc , gpRequesterTargetMerc, gsRequesterGridNo );
02519       }
02520 }

02522 
02523 UINT32 UIHandleCAMercShoot( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
02524 {
02525       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
02526       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier, *pTSoldier = NULL;
02527       BOOLEAN                                   fDidRequester = FALSE;
02528 
02529       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
02530       {
02531 
02532             if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
02533             {
02534                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
02535             }
02536             
02537             // Get soldier
02538             if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02539             {
02540                   // Get target guy...
02541                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
02542                   {
02543                         // Get target soldier, if one exists
02544                         pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
02545                   }
02546 
02547 
02548                   if ( pTSoldier != NULL )
02549                   {
02550                         // If this is one of our own guys.....pop up requiester...
02551                         if ( ( pTSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pTSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM ) && Item[ pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass != IC_MEDKIT && !Item[pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem].gascan && gTacticalStatus.ubLastRequesterTargetID != pTSoldier->ubProfile && ( pTSoldier->ubID != pSoldier->ubID ) )
02552                         {
02553                               INT16                                     zStr[200];
02554 
02555                               gpRequesterMerc                 = pSoldier;
02556                               gpRequesterTargetMerc = pTSoldier;
02557                               gsRequesterGridNo = usMapPos;
02558 
02559                               fDidRequester = TRUE;
02560 
02561                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)zStr, (wchar_t *)TacticalStr[ ATTACK_OWN_GUY_PROMPT ], pTSoldier->name );
02562 
02563                               DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zStr, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, AttackRequesterCallback, NULL );
02564 
02565                         }
02566                   }
02567 
02568                   if ( !fDidRequester )
02569                   {
02570                         UIHandleMercAttack( pSoldier, pTSoldier, usMapPos );
02571                   }
02572             }
02573       }
02574 
02575       return( GAME_SCREEN );
02576 }

02579 UINT32 UIHandleAEndAction( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
02580 {
02581       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;

02583       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
02584

02587       {
02588             return( GAME_SCREEN );
02589       }
02590 
02591 
02592       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
02593       {
02594             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02595             {

02597                   {
02598                         // Move to proper stance + direction!
02599                         // Convert our grid-not into an XY
02600                         ConvertGridNoToXY( usMapPos, &sTargetXPos, &sTargetYPos );
02601 
02602                         // UNReady weapon
02603                         SoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos, TRUE );
02604 
02605                         gUITargetReady = FALSE;
02606                   }
02607 
02608             }
02609       }
02610       return( GAME_SCREEN );
02611 }

02659 UINT32 UIHandlePADJAdjustStance( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
02660 {
02661       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02662       UINT8                                     ubNewStance;
02663       BOOLEAN                                   fChangeStance = FALSE;
02664 
02665       guiShowUPDownArrows                             = ARROWS_HIDE_UP | ARROWS_HIDE_DOWN;
02666 
02667 
02668       gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
02669 
02670       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER && gbAdjustStanceDiff != 0 )
02671       {
02672                   // Get soldier
02673                   if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02674                   {
02675                               ubNewStance = GetAdjustedAnimHeight( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight, gbAdjustStanceDiff );
02676 
02677                               if ( gbClimbID    == 1 )
02678                               {
02679                                     BeginSoldierClimbUpRoof( pSoldier );
02680                               }
02681                               else if ( gbClimbID == -1 )
02682                               {
02683                                     BeginSoldierClimbDownRoof( pSoldier );
02684                               }
02685                               else
02686                               {
02687                                     // Set state to result
02688                                     UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( pSoldier->ubID, ubNewStance );
02689                               }
02690 
02691                           // Once we have APs, we can safely reset nomove flag!
02692                               // AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
02693 
02694                   }
02695 
02696       }
02697       return( GAME_SCREEN );
02698 }
02699 
02700 
02701 UINT8 GetAdjustedAnimHeight( UINT8 ubAnimHeight, INT8 bChange )
02702 {
02703       UINT8 ubNewAnimHeight = ubAnimHeight;
02704 
02705       if ( ubAnimHeight == ANIM_STAND )
02706       {
02707             if ( bChange == -1 )
02708             {
02709                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_CROUCH;
02710             }
02711             if ( bChange == -2 )
02712             {
02713                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
02714             }
02715             if ( bChange == 1 )
02716             {
02717                   ubNewAnimHeight = 50;   
02718             }
02719       }
02720       else if ( ubAnimHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
02721       {
02722             if ( bChange == 1 )
02723             {
02724                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_STAND;
02725             }
02726             if ( bChange == -1 )
02727             {
02728                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
02729             }
02730             if ( bChange == -2 )
02731             {
02732                   ubNewAnimHeight = 55;
02733             }
02734       }
02735       else if ( ubAnimHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
02736       {
02737             if ( bChange == -1 )
02738             {
02739                   ubNewAnimHeight = 55;   
02740             }
02741             if ( bChange == 1 )
02742             {
02743                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_CROUCH;
02744             }
02745             if ( bChange == 2 )
02746             {
02747                   ubNewAnimHeight = ANIM_STAND;
02748             }
02749       }
02750 
02751       return( ubNewAnimHeight );
02752 }
02753 
02754 void HandleObjectHighlighting( )
02755 {
02756       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02757       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
02758 
02759       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
02760       {
02761             return;
02762       }
02763 
02764       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
02765       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
02766       {
02767             // Get Soldier
02768             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
02769 
02770             // If an enemy, and in a given mode, highlight
02771             if ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & ENEMY_MERC  )
02772             {
02773                   switch( gCurrentUIMode )
02774                   {
02775 
02776                         case CONFIRM_MOVE_MODE:
02777                         case MENU_MODE:
02778 
02779                               break;
02780                   
02781                         case MOVE_MODE:
02782                         case CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE:
02783                         //case ACTION_MODE:
02784                         case IDLE_MODE:
02785 
02786                               // Set as selected
02787                               //pSoldier->pCurrentShade = pSoldier->pShades[ 1 ];
02788                               break;
02789                   }
02790             }
02791             else if ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & OWNED_MERC )
02792             {
02793                   // Check for selected
02794                   pSoldier->pCurrentShade = pSoldier->pShades[ 0 ];
02795                   gfUIDoNotHighlightSelMerc = TRUE;
02796             }
02797       }
02798 
02799 }
02800 
02801 void AdjustSoldierCreationStartValues( )
02802 {
02803       INT32                   cnt;
02804       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
02805 
02806       
02807       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
02808       guiCreateGuyIndex = (INT16)cnt;
02809 
02810       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
02811       {     
02812             if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
02813             {
02814                   guiCreateGuyIndex = (INT16)cnt;
02815                   break;
02816             }     
02817       }
02818 
02819       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID + 1;
02820       guiCreateBadGuyIndex = (INT16)cnt;
02821 
02822       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ LAST_TEAM ].bLastID; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
02823       {
02824             if ( !pSoldier->bActive && cnt > gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID )
02825             {
02826                   guiCreateBadGuyIndex = (INT16)cnt;
02827                   break;
02828             }     
02829       }
02830 
02831 }
02832 
02833 BOOLEAN SelectedMercCanAffordAttack( )
02834 {
02835       SOLDIERTYPE                               *pSoldier;
02836       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTargetSoldier;
02837       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
02838       INT16                                     sTargetGridNo;
02839       BOOLEAN                                   fEnoughPoints = TRUE;
02840       INT16                                     sAPCost;
02841       UINT8                                     ubItemCursor;
02842       UINT16                                    usInHand;
02843 
02844       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
02845       {
02846 
02847             if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
02848             {
02849                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
02850             }
02851             
02852             // Get soldier
02853             if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02854             {
02855                   // LOOK IN GUY'S HAND TO CHECK LOCATION
02856                   usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
02857 
02858                   // Get cursor value
02859                   ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
02860 
02861                   if ( ubItemCursor == INVALIDCURS )
02862                   {
02863                         return( FALSE );
02864                   }
02865 
02866                   if ( ubItemCursor == BOMBCURS )
02867                   {
02868                         // Check as...
02869                     if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, GetTotalAPsToDropBomb( pSoldier, usMapPos ), 0, TRUE ) )
02870                         {
02871                           return( TRUE );
02872                         }
02873                   }
02874                   else if ( ubItemCursor == REMOTECURS )
02875                   {
02876                         // Check as...
02877                     if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, GetAPsToUseRemote( pSoldier ), 0, TRUE ) )
02878                         {
02879                           return( TRUE );
02880                         }
02881                   }
02882                   else
02883                   {
02884                          // Look for a soldier at this position
02885                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
02886                         {
02887                                     // GetSoldier
02888                                     GetSoldier( &pTargetSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
02889                                     sTargetGridNo     = pTargetSoldier->sGridNo;
02890                          }
02891                          else
02892                          {
02893                                     sTargetGridNo     = usMapPos;
02894                          }
02895 
02896                          sAPCost = CalcTotalAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ) );
02897 
02898                          if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
02899                          {
02900                                return( TRUE );
02901                          }
02902                          else
02903                          {
02904                                // Play curse....
02905                                DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02906                          }
02907                   }
02908              }
02909 
02910        }
02911 
02912       return( FALSE );
02913 }
02914 
02915 
02916 BOOLEAN SelectedMercCanAffordMove(  )
02917 {
02918       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02919       UINT16                                    sAPCost = 0;
02920       INT16                                     sBPCost = 0;
02921       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
02922       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
02923       
02924       // Get soldier
02925       if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
02926       {
02927             if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
02928             {
02929                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
02930             }
02931 
02932 
02933             // IF WE ARE OVER AN INTERACTIVE TILE, GIVE GRIDNO OF POSITION
02934             pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTile( );
02935 
02936             if ( pIntTile != NULL )
02937             {
02938                   // CHECK APS
02939                   if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0 , TRUE ) )
02940                   {
02941                         return( TRUE );
02942                   }
02943                   else
02944                   {
02945                         return( FALSE );
02946                   }
02947             }
02948 
02949             // Take the first direction!
02950             sAPCost = PtsToMoveDirection( pSoldier, (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] );
02951 
02952     sAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usUIMovementMode ].ubHeight );
02953 
02954             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0 , TRUE ) )
02955             {
02956                   return( TRUE );
02957             }     
02958             else
02959             {
02960                   // OK, remember where we were trying to get to.....
02961                   pSoldier->sContPathLocation = usMapPos;
02962                   pSoldier->bGoodContPath             = TRUE;
02963             }
02964       }
02965 
02966       return( FALSE );
02967 }
02968 
02969 void GetMercClimbDirection( UINT8 ubSoldierID, BOOLEAN *pfGoDown, BOOLEAN *pfGoUp )
02970 {
02971       INT8                                      bNewDirection;
02972       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
02973 
02974       *pfGoDown = FALSE;
02975       *pfGoUp   = FALSE;
02976       
02977       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, ubSoldierID ) )
02978       {
02979             return;
02980       }
02981 
02982       // Check if we are close / can climb
02983       if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02984       {
02985             // See if we are not in a building!
02986             if ( FindHeigherLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) )
02987             {
02988                   *pfGoUp = TRUE;
02989             }
02990       }
02991 
02992       // IF we are higher...
02993       if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
02994       {
02995             if ( FindLowerLevel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection, &bNewDirection ) )
02996             {
02997                   *pfGoDown = TRUE;
02998             }
02999       }
03000 
03001 
03002 
03003 }

03017 UINT32 UIHandleHCOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
03018 {
03019       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
03020       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
03021 
03022       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
03023       {
03024             return( GAME_SCREEN );
03025       }
03026 
03027       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
03028       {
03029             return( GAME_SCREEN );
03030       }
03031 
03032       // If we are out of breath, no cursor...
03033       if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && pSoldier->bCollapsed )
03034       {
03035             guiNewUICursor = INVALID_ACTION_UICURSOR;
03036       }
03037   else
03038   {
03039         if ( gsOverItemsGridNo != NOWHERE && ( usMapPos != gsOverItemsGridNo || gsInterfaceLevel != gsOverItemsLevel ) )
03040         {
03041               gsOverItemsGridNo = NOWHERE;
03042               guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03043         }
03044         else
03045         {
03046               guiNewUICursor = NORMALHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR;
03047 
03048               UIHandleInteractiveTilesAndItemsOnTerrain( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, FALSE );
03049         }
03050   }
03051       return( GAME_SCREEN );
03052 }

03085 
03086 void ToggleHandCursorMode( UINT32 *puiNewEvent  )
03087 {
03088       // Toggle modes               
03089       if ( gCurrentUIMode == HANDCURSOR_MODE )
03090       {
03091             *puiNewEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03092       }
03093       else
03094       {
03095             
03096             *puiNewEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_HANDMODE;
03097       }
03098 }
03099 
03100 void ToggleTalkCursorMode( UINT32 *puiNewEvent  )
03101 {
03102       // Toggle modes               
03103       if ( gCurrentUIMode == TALKCURSOR_MODE )
03104       {
03105             *puiNewEvent       = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03106       }
03107       else
03108       {
03109             *puiNewEvent = T_CHANGE_TO_TALKING;
03110       }
03111 }
03112 
03113 void ToggleLookCursorMode( UINT32 *puiNewEvent  )
03114 {
03115       // Toggle modes               
03116       if ( gCurrentUIMode == LOOKCURSOR_MODE )
03117       {
03118             guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;
03119             HandleTacticalUI( );
03120       }
03121       else
03122       {
03123             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LC_CHANGE_TO_LOOK;
03124             HandleTacticalUI( );
03125       }
03126 }
03127 
03128 
03129 BOOLEAN UIHandleOnMerc( BOOLEAN fMovementMode )
03130 {
03131       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
03132       UINT16                                    usSoldierIndex;
03133       UINT32                                    uiMercFlags;
03134       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
03135       BOOLEAN                                   fFoundMerc = FALSE;
03136 
03137       if( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos) )
03138       {
03139             return( GAME_SCREEN );
03140       }
03141 
03142       //if ( fMovementMode )
03143       //{
03144       //    fFoundMerc              = gfUISelectiveTargetFound;
03145       //    usSoldierIndex    = gusUISelectiveTargetID;
03146       //    uiMercFlags             = guiUISelectiveTargetFlags;
03147       //}
03148       //else
03149       {
03150             fFoundMerc              = gfUIFullTargetFound;
03151             usSoldierIndex    = gusUIFullTargetID;
03152             uiMercFlags             = guiUIFullTargetFlags;
03153       }
03154       
03155       // CHECK IF WE'RE ON A GUY ( EITHER SELECTED, OURS, OR THEIRS
03156       if ( fFoundMerc )
03157       {
03158             // Get Soldier
03159             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, usSoldierIndex );
03160 
03161             if ( uiMercFlags & OWNED_MERC )
03162             {
03163                   // ATE: Check if this is an empty vehicle.....
03164                   //if ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pSoldier ) && GetNumberInVehicle( pSoldier->bVehicleID ) == 0 )
03165                   //{
03166                   //    return( FALSE );
03167                   //}
03168 
03169                   // If not unconscious, select
03170                   if ( !( uiMercFlags & UNCONSCIOUS_MERC ) )
03171                   {
03172                         if ( fMovementMode )
03173                         {
03174                               // ERASE PATH
03175                               ErasePath( TRUE );
03176 
03177                               // Show cursor with highlight on selected merc
03178                               guiNewUICursor                                        = NO_UICURSOR;
03179 
03180                               // IF selected, do selection one
03181                               if ( ( uiMercFlags & SELECTED_MERC ) )
03182                               {
03183                                     // Add highlight to guy in interface.c
03184                                     gfUIHandleSelection                                         = SELECTED_GUY_SELECTION;
03185 
03186                                     if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
03187                                     {                                         
03188                                           // Don't do this unless we want to
03189 
03190                                           // Check if buddy is stationary!
03191                                           if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY || pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
03192                                           {
03193                                                 guiShowUPDownArrows                                         = ARROWS_SHOW_DOWN_BESIDE | ARROWS_SHOW_UP_BESIDE;
03194                                           }
03195                                     }
03196 
03197                               }
03198                               else
03199                               {
03200                                     //if ( ( uiMercFlags & ONDUTY_MERC ) && !( uiMercFlags & NOINTERRUPT_MERC ) )
03201                                     if ( !( uiMercFlags & NOINTERRUPT_MERC ) )
03202                                     {
03203                                           // Add highlight to guy in interface.c
03204                                           gfUIHandleSelection                                         = NONSELECTED_GUY_SELECTION;
03205                                     }
03206                                     else
03207                                     {
03208                                           gfUIHandleSelection                                         = ENEMY_GUY_SELECTION;
03209                                           gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy               = TRUE;
03210                                     }
03211                               }
03212                         }
03213                   }
03214 
03215                   // If not dead, show above guy!
03216                   if ( !( uiMercFlags & DEAD_MERC ) )
03217                   {
03218                         if ( fMovementMode )
03219                         {
03220                               // ERASE PATH
03221                               ErasePath( TRUE );
03222 
03223                               // Show cursor with highlight on selected merc
03224                               guiNewUICursor                                                    = NO_UICURSOR;
03225 
03226                               gsSelectedGridNo                                            = pSoldier->sGridNo;
03227                               gsSelectedLevel                                                   = pSoldier->bLevel;
03228                         }
03229 
03230                         gsSelectedGuy                                                           = usSoldierIndex;
03231                         gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy               = TRUE;
03232                   }
03233 
03234             }
03235             else if ( ( ( uiMercFlags & ENEMY_MERC ) || ( uiMercFlags & NEUTRAL_MERC ) ) && ( uiMercFlags & VISIBLE_MERC ) )
03236             {
03237                   // ATE: If we are a vehicle, let the mouse cursor be a wheel...
03238                   if ( ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pSoldier ) ) )
03239                   {
03240                         return( FALSE );
03241                   }
03242                   else
03243                   {
03244                         if ( fMovementMode )
03245                         {
03246 
03247                               // Check if this guy is on the enemy team....
03248                               if ( !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
03249                               {
03250                                     gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver = TRUE;
03251 
03252                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_CHANGE_TO_ACTION;
03253                                     // Return FALSE
03254                                     return( FALSE );
03255                               }
03256                               else
03257                               {
03258                                     // ERASE PATH
03259                                     ErasePath( TRUE );
03260 
03261                                     // Show cursor with highlight on selected merc
03262                                     guiNewUICursor                                        = NO_UICURSOR;
03263                                     // Show cursor with highlight
03264                                     gfUIHandleSelection                                         = ENEMY_GUY_SELECTION;
03265                                     gsSelectedGridNo                                            = pSoldier->sGridNo;
03266                                     gsSelectedLevel                                                   = pSoldier->bLevel;
03267                               }
03268                         }
03269 
03270                         gfUIHandleSelectionAboveGuy               = TRUE;
03271                         gsSelectedGuy                                                           = usSoldierIndex;
03272                   }
03273             }
03274             else
03275             {
03276                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
03277                   {
03278                         return( FALSE );
03279                   }
03280             }
03281       }
03282       else
03283       {
03284             gfIgnoreOnSelectedGuy = FALSE;
03285 
03286             return( FALSE );
03287       }                       
03288 
03289       return( TRUE );
03290 }
03291 
03292 UINT32 UIHandleILoadLevel( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
03293 {
03294       return( INIT_SCREEN );
03295 }

03331 
03332 void UIHandleSoldierStanceChange( UINT8 ubSoldierID, INT8   bNewStance )
03333 {
03334       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03335 
03336       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
03337 
03338       // Is this a valid stance for our position?
03339       if ( !IsValidStance( pSoldier, bNewStance ) )
03340       {
03341     if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed && pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH )
03342     {
03343                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 4 ], pSoldier->name );
03344     }
03345     else
03346     {
03347               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
03348               {
03349                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ VEHICLES_NO_STANCE_CHANGE_STR ] );
03350               }
03351               else if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
03352               {
03353                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ ROBOT_NO_STANCE_CHANGE_STR ] );
03354               }
03355               else
03356               {
03357                     if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed )
03358                     {
03359                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CANT_CHANGE_STANCE ], pSoldier->name );
03360                     }
03361                     else
03362                     {
03363                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_STANCE_CHANGE_STR ], pSoldier->name );
03364                     }
03365               }
03366     }
03367             return;
03368       }
03369 
03370       // IF turn-based - adjust stance now!
03371       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
03372       {
03373             pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = FALSE;
03374 
03375             // Check if we have enough APS
03376             if ( SoldierCanAffordNewStance( pSoldier, bNewStance ) )
03377             {
03378                   // Adjust stance
03379                   //ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, bNewStance );
03380                   SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, bNewStance );
03381 
03382                   pSoldier->sFinalDestination = pSoldier->sGridNo;
03383                   pSoldier->bGoodContPath             = FALSE;
03384 
03385             }
03386             else
03387                   return;
03388       }
03389       
03390       // If realtime- change walking animation!
03391       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
03392       {
03393 
03394             // If we are stationary, do something else!
03395             if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY )
03396             {
03397                   // Change stance normally
03398                   SendChangeSoldierStanceEvent( pSoldier, bNewStance );
03399 
03400             }
03401             else
03402             {
03403                   // Pick moving animation based on stance
03404 
03405                   // LOCK VARIBLE FOR NO UPDATE INDEX...
03406                   pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, bNewStance );
03407 
03408                   if ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode == CRAWLING && gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_PRONE )
03409                   {
03410                         pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange = LOCKED_NO_NEWGRIDNO;
03411                         pSoldier->bPathStored = FALSE;
03412                   }
03413                   else
03414                   {
03415                         pSoldier->usDontUpdateNewGridNoOnMoveAnimChange = 1;
03416                   }
03417 
03418 
03419                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 0, FALSE );
03420                   
03421             }
03422       }
03423 
03424       // Set UI value for soldier
03425       SetUIbasedOnStance( pSoldier, bNewStance );
03426 
03427       gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
03428 
03429       // ATE: If we are being serviced...stop...
03430       // InternalReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );
03431       InternalGivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier, FALSE );
03432       //gfPlotNewMovement   = TRUE;
03433 
03434 }

03438       return( GAME_SCREEN );
03439 }
