03478 
03479 void GetCursorMovementFlags( UINT32 *puiCursorFlags )
03480 {
03481       UINT16      usMapPos;
03482       INT16       sXPos, sYPos;
03483 
03484       static  BOOLEAN fStationary = FALSE;
03485       static      UINT16      usOldMouseXPos  = 32000;
03486       static      UINT16      usOldMouseYPos  = 32000;
03487       static      UINT16  usOldMapPos             = 32000;
03488       
03489       static      UINT32  uiSameFrameCursorFlags;
03490       static  UINT32    uiOldFrameNumber = 99999;
03491 
03492       // Check if this is the same frame as before, return already calculated value if so!
03493       if ( uiOldFrameNumber == guiGameCycleCounter )
03494       {
03495             ( *puiCursorFlags ) = uiSameFrameCursorFlags;
03496             return;
03497       }
03498       
03499       GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos );
03500       ConvertGridNoToXY( usMapPos, &sXPos, &sYPos );
03501 
03502       *puiCursorFlags = 0;
03503 
03504       if ( gusMouseXPos != usOldMouseXPos || gusMouseYPos != usOldMouseYPos )
03505       {
03506             (*puiCursorFlags ) |= MOUSE_MOVING;
03507 
03508             // IF CURSOR WAS PREVIOUSLY STATIONARY, MAKE THE ADDITIONAL CHECK OF GRID POS CHANGE
03509             if ( fStationary && usOldMapPos == usMapPos )
03510             {
03511                   (*puiCursorFlags) |= MOUSE_MOVING_IN_TILE;                   
03512             }
03513             else
03514             {
03515                   fStationary = FALSE;
03516                   (*puiCursorFlags) |= MOUSE_MOVING_NEW_TILE;                  
03517             }
03518 
03519       }
03520       else
03521       {
03522             (*puiCursorFlags) |= MOUSE_STATIONARY;                
03523             fStationary = TRUE;
03524       }
03525 
03526       usOldMapPos = usMapPos;
03527       usOldMouseXPos = gusMouseXPos;
03528       usOldMouseYPos = gusMouseYPos;
03529 
03530       uiOldFrameNumber                    = guiGameCycleCounter;
03531       uiSameFrameCursorFlags  = (*puiCursorFlags);
03532 }
03533 
03534 BOOLEAN HandleUIMovementCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT32 uiCursorFlags, UINT16 usMapPos, UINT32 uiFlags )
03535 {
03536       BOOLEAN                                   fSetCursor = FALSE;
03537       BOOLEAN                                   fCalculated = FALSE;
03538       static                                    UINT16 usTargetID = NOBODY;
03539       static                                    BOOLEAN     fTargetFound = FALSE;
03540       BOOLEAN                                   fTargetFoundAndLookingForOne = FALSE;
03541       BOOLEAN                                   fIntTileFoundAndLookingForOne = FALSE;
03542 
03543        // Determine if we can afford!
03544        if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
03545        {
03546              gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
03547        }
03548 
03549        // Check if we're stationary
03550        if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) || ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) || pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove ) || pSoldier->ubID >= MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS )
03551        {
03552               // If we are targeting a merc for some reason, don't go thorugh normal channels if we are on someone now
03553                   if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCS || uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCSFORAID )
03554                   {
03555                         if ( gfUIFullTargetFound != fTargetFound || usTargetID != gusUIFullTargetID || gfResetUIMovementOptimization )
03556                         {
03557                               gfResetUIMovementOptimization = FALSE;
03558 
03559                               // ERASE PATH
03560                               ErasePath( TRUE );
03561 
03562                               // Try and get a path right away
03563                               DrawUIMovementPath( pSoldier, usMapPos,  uiFlags );
03564                         }
03565 
03566                         // Save for next time...
03567                         fTargetFound = gfUIFullTargetFound;
03568                         usTargetID   = gusUIFullTargetID;
03569 
03570                         if ( fTargetFound )
03571                         {
03572                               fTargetFoundAndLookingForOne = TRUE;
03573                         }
03574                   }
03575 
03576                   if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_ITEMS )
03577                   {                                                                 
03578                         gfUIOverItemPool = TRUE;
03579                         gfUIOverItemPoolGridNo = usMapPos;
03580                   }
03581                   else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCSFORAID )
03582                   {
03583                         // Set values for AP display...
03584                         gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
03585                   }
03586 
03587                   // IF CURSOR IS MOVING
03588                   if ( ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING ) || gfUINewStateForIntTile )
03589                   {
03590                         // SHOW CURSOR
03591                         fSetCursor = TRUE;
03592 
03593                         // IF CURSOR WAS PREVIOUSLY STATIONARY, MAKE THE ADDITIONAL CHECK OF GRID POS CHANGE
03594                         if (  ( ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING_NEW_TILE ) && !fTargetFoundAndLookingForOne ) || gfUINewStateForIntTile )
03595                         {
03596                               // ERASE PATH
03597                               ErasePath( TRUE );
03598                               
03599                               // Reset counter
03600                               RESETCOUNTER( PATHFINDCOUNTER );
03601 
03602                               gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03603 
03604                         }
03605                         
03606                         if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_MOVING_IN_TILE )
03607                         {
03608                               gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
03609                         }
03610 
03611                    }
03612 
03613                    if ( uiCursorFlags & MOUSE_STATIONARY )
03614                    {
03615                               // CURSOR IS STATIONARY
03616                               if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) && !gfPlotNewMovementNOCOST )
03617                               {
03618                                     gfPlotNewMovementNOCOST = TRUE;
03619                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03620                               }
03621                               if ( !(_KeyDown( SHIFT ) ) && gfPlotNewMovementNOCOST )
03622                               {
03623                                     gfPlotNewMovementNOCOST = FALSE;
03624                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03625                               }
03626 
03627 
03628                               // ONLY DIPSLAY PATH AFTER A DELAY
03629                               if ( COUNTERDONE( PATHFINDCOUNTER ) )
03630                               {
03631                                     // Reset counter
03632                                     RESETCOUNTER( PATHFINDCOUNTER );
03633 
03634                                     if ( gfPlotNewMovement  )
03635                                     {
03636                                           DrawUIMovementPath( pSoldier, usMapPos,  uiFlags );
03637 
03638                                           gfPlotNewMovement = FALSE;
03639                                     }
03640                               }
03641                                           
03642                               fSetCursor = TRUE;
03643 
03644                               // DISPLAY POINTS EVEN WITHOUT DELAY
03645                               // ONLY IF GFPLOT NEW MOVEMENT IS FALSE!
03646                               if ( !gfPlotNewMovement )
03647                               {
03648                                     if ( gsCurrentActionPoints < 0 || ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
03649                                     {
03650                                           gfUIDisplayActionPoints = FALSE;
03651                                     }
03652                                     else
03653                                     {
03654                                           gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
03655 
03656                                           if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_INTTILES )
03657                                           {
03658                                                 // Set values for AP display...
03659                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 22;
03660                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
03661                                           }
03662                                           if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_BOMB )
03663                                           {
03664                                                 // Set values for AP display...
03665                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 22;
03666                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
03667                                           }
03668                                           else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_ITEMS )
03669                                           {
03670                                                 // Set values for AP display...
03671                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 22;
03672                                                 gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
03673                                           }
03674                                           else 
03675                                           {
03676                                                 switch ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode )
03677                                                 {
03678                                                       case WALKING:
03679                                                             
03680                                                             gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 10;
03681                                                             gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 10;
03682                                                             break;
03683 
03684                                                       case RUNNING:
03685                                                             gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 15;
03686                                                             gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 21;
03687                                                             break;
03688                                                 }
03689                                           }
03690                                     }
03691                               }
03692                   }
03693 
03694             }
03695             else
03696             {
03697                   // THE MERC IS MOVING
03698                   // We're moving, erase path, change cursor
03699                   ErasePath( TRUE );
03700 
03701                   fSetCursor = TRUE;
03702 
03703             }
03704 
03705             if(pSoldier->bDoAutofire) //reset the autofire bullet count
03706             {
03707                   pSoldier->autofireLastStep = FALSE;
03708                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;  
03709             }
03710 
03711             return( fSetCursor );
03712 }
03713 
03714 
03715 
03716 INT8 DrawUIMovementPath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos, UINT32 uiFlags )
03717 {
03718       INT16                                     sAPCost, sBPCost;
03719       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
03720       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;
03721       BOOLEAN                                   fOnInterTile = FALSE;
03722       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
03723 //    ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
03724       INT16                                     sAdjustedGridNo;
03725   INT16                                         sIntTileGridNo;
03726       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
03727       INT8                                      bReturnCode = 0;
03728       BOOLEAN                                   fPlot;
03729       UINT8                                     ubMercID;
03730 
03731       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) || _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
03732       {
03733             fPlot = PLOT;                 
03734       }
03735       else
03736       {
03737             fPlot = NO_PLOT;
03738       }
03739 
03740       sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
03741       sAPCost                       = 0;
03742 
03743       ErasePath( FALSE );
03744 
03745       // IF WE ARE OVER AN INTERACTIVE TILE, GIVE GRIDNO OF POSITION
03746       if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_INTTILES )
03747       {
03748                   // Get structure info for in tile!
03749                   pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo, &pStructure );
03750 
03751                   // We should not have null here if we are given this flag...
03752                   if ( pIntTile != NULL )
03753                   {
03754                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sIntTileGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03755                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03756                         {
03757                               sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
03758                         }
03759                         CalcInteractiveObjectAPs( sIntTileGridNo, pStructure, &sAPCost, &sBPCost );
03760                         //sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, PLOT, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03761                         sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03762                         
03763                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03764                         {
03765                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03766                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03767                         }
03768 
03769                         // Add cost for stance change....
03770                         sAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
03771                   }
03772                   else
03773                   {
03774                         sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
03775                   }
03776       }
03777       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_WIREFENCE )
03778       {
03779             sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, usMapPos, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03780             if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03781             {
03782                   sAPCost = 0;
03783             }
03784     else
03785     {
03786               sAPCost = GetAPsToCutFence( pSoldier );
03787 
03788               sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03789                           
03790               if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03791               {
03792                     gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03793                     gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03794               }
03795     }
03796       }
03797       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_JAR )
03798       {
03799             sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, usMapPos, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03800             if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03801             {
03802                   sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
03803             }
03804 
03805             sAPCost = GetAPsToUseJar( pSoldier, sActionGridNo );
03806 
03807             sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03808                         
03809             if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03810             {
03811                   gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03812                   gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03813             }
03814       }
03815       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_CAN )
03816       {
03817             // Get structure info for in tile!
03818             pIntTile = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo, &pStructure );
03819 
03820             // We should not have null here if we are given this flag...
03821             if ( pIntTile != NULL )
03822             {
03823                   sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sIntTileGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03824                   if ( sActionGridNo != -1 )
03825                   {
03826                         sAPCost = AP_ATTACH_CAN;
03827                         sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03828                               
03829                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03830                         {
03831                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03832                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03833                         }
03834                   }
03835             }
03836             else
03837             {
03838                   sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
03839             }
03840 
03841       }
03842       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_REPAIR )
03843       {
03844             // For repair, check if we are over a vehicle, then get gridnot to edge of that vehicle!
03845             if ( IsRepairableStructAtGridNo( usMapPos, &ubMercID ) == 2 )
03846             {
03847                   INT16 sNewGridNo;
03848                   UINT8 ubDirection;
03849 
03850               sNewGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 5, &ubDirection, 0, MercPtrs[ ubMercID ] );
03851 
03852                   if ( sNewGridNo != NOWHERE )
03853                   {
03854                         usMapPos = sNewGridNo;
03855                   }
03856             }
03857 
03858             sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, usMapPos, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03859             if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03860             {
03861                   sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
03862             }
03863 
03864             sAPCost = GetAPsToBeginRepair( pSoldier );
03865 
03866             sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03867                         
03868             if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03869             {
03870                   gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03871                   gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03872             }
03873       }
03874       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_REFUEL )
03875       {
03876             // For repair, check if we are over a vehicle, then get gridnot to edge of that vehicle!
03877             if ( IsRefuelableStructAtGridNo( usMapPos, &ubMercID ) == 2 )
03878             {
03879                   INT16 sNewGridNo;
03880                   UINT8 ubDirection;
03881 
03882               sNewGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructDataFromSoldier( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 5, &ubDirection, 0, MercPtrs[ ubMercID ] );
03883 
03884                   if ( sNewGridNo != NOWHERE )
03885                   {
03886                         usMapPos = sNewGridNo;
03887                   }
03888             }
03889 
03890             sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, usMapPos, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
03891             if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03892             {
03893                   sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
03894             }
03895 
03896             sAPCost = GetAPsToRefuelVehicle( pSoldier );
03897 
03898             sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03899                         
03900             if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03901             {
03902                   gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03903                   gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03904             }
03905       }
03906       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCS )
03907       {
03908                INT16          sGotLocation = NOWHERE;
03909                BOOLEAN  fGotAdjacent = FALSE;
03910 
03911                   // Check if we are on a target
03912                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
03913                   {
03914                          INT32            cnt;
03915                          INT16            sSpot;      
03916                          UINT8            ubGuyThere;
03917 
03918                          for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; cnt++ )
03919                          {
03920                                     sSpot = (INT16)NewGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (INT8)cnt ) );
03921 
03922             // Make sure movement costs are OK....
03923             if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot ][ cnt ][ gsInterfaceLevel ] >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
03924             {
03925               continue;
03926             }
03927 
03928 
03929                                     // Check for who is there...
03930                                     ubGuyThere = WhoIsThere2( sSpot, pSoldier->bLevel );
03931 
03932                                     if ( ubGuyThere == MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->ubID )
03933                                     {
03934                                           // We've got a guy here....
03935                                           // Who is the one we want......
03936                                           sGotLocation = sSpot;
03937                                           sAdjustedGridNo   = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
03938                                           ubDirection       = ( UINT8 )cnt;
03939                                           break;
03940                                     }
03941                          }
03942 
03943                          if ( sGotLocation == NOWHERE )
03944                          {
03945                                     sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
03946 
03947                                     if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03948                                     {
03949                                           sGotLocation = NOWHERE;
03950                                     }
03951                                     else
03952                                     {
03953                                           sGotLocation = sActionGridNo;
03954                                     }
03955                                     fGotAdjacent = TRUE;
03956                          }
03957       }
03958       else
03959       {
03960         sAdjustedGridNo = usMapPos;
03961                     sGotLocation = sActionGridNo;
03962                         fGotAdjacent = TRUE;
03963       }
03964 
03965                    if ( sGotLocation != NOWHERE )
03966                    {
03967                          sAPCost += MinAPsToAttack( pSoldier, sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE );
03968                          sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sGotLocation, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03969 
03970                          if ( sGotLocation != pSoldier->sGridNo && fGotAdjacent )
03971                          {
03972                                     gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03973                                     gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sGotLocation;
03974                          }
03975                    }
03976       }
03977       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_STEAL )
03978       {
03979                   // Check if we are on a target
03980                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
03981                   {
03982                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
03983                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
03984                         {
03985                               sActionGridNo = sAdjustedGridNo;
03986                         }
03987                         sAPCost += AP_STEAL_ITEM;
03988                         // CJC August 13 2002: take into account stance in AP prediction
03989                         if (!(PTR_STANDING))
03990                         {
03991                               sAPCost += GetAPsToChangeStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
03992                         }
03993                         sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
03994 
03995                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
03996                         {
03997                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
03998                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
03999                         }
04000                   }
04001       }
04002       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_BOMB )
04003       {
04004             sAPCost += GetAPsToDropBomb( pSoldier );
04005             sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, usMapPos, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
04006 
04007             gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
04008             gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = usMapPos;
04009       }
04010       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_MERCSFORAID )
04011       {
04012                   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04013                   {
04014                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
04015 
04016                         // Try again at another gridno...
04017                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04018                         {
04019                               sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, usMapPos, &ubDirection, &sAdjustedGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
04020 
04021                               if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04022                               {
04023                                     sActionGridNo = sAdjustedGridNo;
04024                               }
04025                         }
04026                         sAPCost += GetAPsToBeginFirstAid( pSoldier );
04027                         sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
04028                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
04029                         {
04030                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
04031                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
04032                         }
04033                   }
04034       }
04035       else if ( uiFlags == MOVEUI_TARGET_ITEMS )
04036       {
04037             //if ( GetItemPool( usMapPos, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
04038             {
04039                   //if ( ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) )
04040                   {
04041                         sActionGridNo = AdjustGridNoForItemPlacement( pSoldier, sActionGridNo );
04042 
04043                         if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != sActionGridNo )
04044                         {
04045                               sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints);
04046                               if ( sAPCost != 0 )
04047                               {
04048                                     sAPCost += AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
04049                               }
04050                         }
04051                         else
04052                         {
04053                                     sAPCost += AP_PICKUP_ITEM;
04054                         }
04055 
04056                         if ( sActionGridNo != pSoldier->sGridNo )
04057                         {
04058                               gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
04059                               gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sActionGridNo;
04060                         }
04061 
04062                   }
04063             }
04064       }
04065       else
04066       {
04067             sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, fPlot, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
04068       }
04069 
04070       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_AP_LEFT )
04071       {
04072             gsCurrentActionPoints = pSoldier->bActionPoints - sAPCost;
04073       }
04074       else
04075       {
04076             gsCurrentActionPoints = sAPCost;
04077       }
04078 
04079       return( bReturnCode );
04080 }
04081 
04082 
04083 BOOLEAN UIMouseOnValidAttackLocation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04084 {
04085   UINT16 usInHand;
04086       BOOLEAN                                   fGuyHere = FALSE;
04087       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pTSoldier;
04088       UINT8                                     ubItemCursor;
04089       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
04090 
04091       if ( !GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
04092       {
04093             return( FALSE );
04094       }
04095 
04096       // LOOK IN GUY'S HAND TO CHECK LOCATION
04097   usInHand = pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem;
04098 
04099       // Get cursor value
04100       ubItemCursor  =  GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier );
04101 
04102       if ( ubItemCursor == INVALIDCURS )
04103       {
04104             return( FALSE );
04105       }
04106 
04107 
04108       if ( ubItemCursor == WIRECUTCURS )
04109       {
04110             if ( IsCuttableWireFenceAtGridNo( usMapPos ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
04111             {
04112                   return( TRUE );
04113             }
04114             else
04115             {
04116                   return( FALSE );
04117             }
04118       }
04119 
04120       if ( ubItemCursor == REPAIRCURS )
04121       {
04122             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04123             {
04124                   usMapPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
04125             }
04126 
04127             if ( IsRepairableStructAtGridNo( usMapPos, NULL ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
04128             {
04129                   return( TRUE );
04130             }
04131             else
04132             {
04133                   return( FALSE );
04134             }
04135       }
04136 
04137       if ( ubItemCursor == REFUELCURS )
04138       {
04139             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04140             {
04141                   usMapPos = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ]->sGridNo;
04142             }
04143 
04144             if ( IsRefuelableStructAtGridNo( usMapPos, NULL ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
04145             {
04146                   return( TRUE );
04147             }
04148             else
04149             {
04150                   return( FALSE );
04151             }
04152       }
04153 
04154       if ( ubItemCursor == BOMBCURS )
04155       {
04156             if ( usMapPos == pSoldier->sGridNo )
04157             {
04158                   return( TRUE );
04159             }
04160 
04161             if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, usMapPos, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
04162             {
04163                   return( FALSE );
04164             }
04165       }
04166 
04167       // SEE IF THERE IS SOMEBODY HERE
04168       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound  && ubItemCursor != KNIFECURS )
04169       {
04170             fGuyHere = TRUE;
04171 
04172             if ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & SELECTED_MERC && Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass != IC_MEDKIT )
04173             {
04174                   return( FALSE );              
04175             }
04176       }
04177 
04178   if ( !CanPlayerUseRocketRifle( pSoldier, TRUE ) )
04179   {
04180     return( FALSE );
04181   }
04182 
04183       //if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE && usInHand != THROWING_KNIFE )     
04184       //{
04185       //    if ( !fGuyHere )
04186       //    {
04187             //    return( FALSE );
04188       //    }
04189       //}
04190 
04191       if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH ) 
04192       {
04193             if ( !fGuyHere )
04194             {
04195                   return( FALSE );
04196             }
04197       }
04198 
04199       //if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE )     
04200       //{
04201       //    if ( !fGuyHere )
04202       //    {
04203       //          return( FALSE );
04204       //    }
04205       //}
04206 
04207       if ( Item[ usInHand ].usItemClass == IC_MEDKIT )      
04208       {
04209             if ( !fGuyHere )
04210             {
04211                   return( FALSE );
04212             }
04213 
04214             // IF a guy's here, chack if they need medical help!
04215             pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
04216 
04217             // If we are a vehicle...
04218             if ( ( pTSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_ROBOT ) ) )
04219             {
04220                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_DO_FIRST_AID_STR ], pTSoldier->name );
04221                   return( FALSE );
04222             }
04223 
04224             if ( pSoldier->bMedical == 0 )
04225             {
04226                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERC_HAS_NO_MEDSKILL ], pSoldier->name );
04227                   return( FALSE );
04228             }
04229 
04230     if ( pTSoldier->bBleeding == 0 && pTSoldier->bLife != pTSoldier->bLifeMax )
04231     {
04232                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 19 ], pTSoldier->name );
04233                   return( FALSE );
04234     }
04235 
04236             if ( pTSoldier->bBleeding == 0 && pTSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04237             {
04238                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_NO_NEED_FIRST_AID_STR ], pTSoldier->name );
04239                   return( FALSE );
04240             }
04241 
04242       }
04243 
04244       return( TRUE );
04245 }
04246 
04247 
04248 BOOLEAN UIOkForItemPickup( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
04249 {
04250       INT16                                     sAPCost;
04251       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
04252 
04253       sAPCost = GetAPsToPickupItem( pSoldier, sGridNo );
04254 
04255       if ( sAPCost == 0 )
04256       {
04257             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
04258       }
04259       else
04260       {
04261             if ( GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
04262             {
04263                   //if ( !ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) )
04264                   {
04265             //          return( FALSE );
04266                   }
04267             }
04268 
04269             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04270             {
04271                   return( TRUE );
04272             }
04273       }
04274 
04275       return( FALSE );
04276 }
04277 
04278 
04279 BOOLEAN SoldierCanAffordNewStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubDesiredStance )
04280 {
04281       INT8        bCurrentHeight;
04282       UINT8       bAP = 0, bBP = 0;
04283 
04284       bCurrentHeight = ( ubDesiredStance - gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
04285 
04286       // Now change to appropriate animation
04287 
04288       switch( bCurrentHeight )
04289       {
04290             case ANIM_STAND - ANIM_CROUCH:
04291             case ANIM_CROUCH - ANIM_STAND:
04292 
04293                   bAP = AP_CROUCH;
04294                   bBP = BP_CROUCH;
04295                   break;
04296 
04297             case ANIM_STAND - ANIM_PRONE:
04298             case ANIM_PRONE - ANIM_STAND:
04299 
04300                   bAP = AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE;
04301                   bBP = BP_CROUCH + BP_PRONE;
04302                   break;
04303 
04304             case ANIM_CROUCH - ANIM_PRONE:
04305             case ANIM_PRONE - ANIM_CROUCH:
04306 
04307                   bAP = AP_PRONE;
04308                   bBP = BP_PRONE;
04309                   break;
04310 
04311       }
04312 
04313       return ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, bAP, bBP , TRUE ) );
04314 }
04315 
04316 void SetUIbasedOnStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bNewStance )
04317 {
04318       // Set UI based on our stance!
04319       switch ( bNewStance )
04320       {
04321                   case ANIM_STAND:
04322                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = WALKING;
04323                         break;
04324 
04325                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
04326                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = SWATTING;
04327                         break;
04328 
04329                   case ANIM_PRONE:
04330                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = CRAWLING;
04331                         break;
04332       }
04333 
04334       // Set UI cursor!
04335 
04336 }
04337 
04338 
04339 void SetMovementModeCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04340 {
04341       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04342       {
04343                   if ( ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pSoldier ) ) )
04344                   {
04345                         guiNewUICursor = MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR;
04346                   }
04347                   else
04348                   {
04349                         // Change mouse cursor based on type of movement we want to do
04350                         switch ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode )
04351                         {
04352                                     case WALKING:
04353                                           guiNewUICursor = MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR;
04354                                           break;
04355 
04356                                     case RUNNING:
04357                                           guiNewUICursor = MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR;
04358                                           break;
04359 
04360                                     case SWATTING:
04361                                           guiNewUICursor = MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR;
04362                                           break;
04363 
04364                                     case CRAWLING:
04365                                           guiNewUICursor = MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR;
04366                                           break;
04367                         }
04368                   }
04369       }
04370 
04371       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04372       {
04373             if ( gfUIAllMoveOn )
04374             {
04375                   guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_REALTIME_UICURSOR;
04376             }
04377             else
04378             {
04379                   //if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast )
04380                   //{
04381                   //    BeginDisplayTimedCursor( MOVE_RUN_REALTIME_UICURSOR, 300 );
04382                   //}
04383 
04384                   guiNewUICursor = MOVE_REALTIME_UICURSOR;
04385             }
04386       }
04387       
04388       guiNewUICursor = GetInteractiveTileCursor( guiNewUICursor, FALSE );
04389 
04390 }
04391 
04392 
04393 
04394 void SetConfirmMovementModeCursor( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fFromMove )
04395 {
04396       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04397       {
04398             if ( gfUIAllMoveOn )
04399             {
04400                   if ( ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pSoldier ) ) )
04401                   {
04402                         guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR;
04403                   }
04404                   else
04405                   {
04406                         // Change mouse cursor based on type of movement we want to do
04407                         switch ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode )
04408                         {
04409                                     case WALKING:
04410                                           guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR;
04411                                           break;
04412 
04413                                     case RUNNING:
04414                                           guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR;
04415                                           break;
04416 
04417                                     case SWATTING:
04418                                           guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR;
04419                                           break;
04420 
04421                                     case CRAWLING:
04422                                           guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR;
04423                                           break;
04424                         }
04425                   }
04426             }
04427             else
04428             {
04429                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
04430                   {
04431                         guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_VEHICLE_UICURSOR;
04432                   }
04433                   else
04434                   {
04435                         // Change mouse cursor based on type of movement we want to do
04436                         switch ( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode )
04437                         {
04438                                     case WALKING:
04439                                           guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_WALK_UICURSOR;
04440                                           break;
04441 
04442                                     case RUNNING:
04443                                           guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_RUN_UICURSOR;
04444                                           break;
04445 
04446                                     case SWATTING:
04447                                           guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_SWAT_UICURSOR;
04448                                           break;
04449 
04450                                     case CRAWLING:
04451                                           guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_PRONE_UICURSOR;
04452                                           break;
04453                         }
04454                   }
04455             }
04456       }
04457 
04458       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME ) || !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04459       {
04460             if ( gfUIAllMoveOn )
04461             {
04462                   if ( gfUIAllMoveOn == 2 )
04463                   {
04464                         BeginDisplayTimedCursor( MOVE_RUN_REALTIME_UICURSOR, 300 );
04465                   }
04466                   else
04467                   {
04468                         guiNewUICursor = ALL_MOVE_REALTIME_UICURSOR;
04469                   }
04470             }
04471             else
04472             {
04473                   if ( pSoldier->fUIMovementFast && pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING && fFromMove )
04474                   {
04475                         BeginDisplayTimedCursor( MOVE_RUN_REALTIME_UICURSOR, 300 );
04476                   }
04477 
04478                   guiNewUICursor = CONFIRM_MOVE_REALTIME_UICURSOR;
04479             }
04480       }
04481 
04482       guiNewUICursor = GetInteractiveTileCursor( guiNewUICursor, TRUE );
04483 
04484 }
04485 
04486 UINT8 gubShowActionPointsInRed = 0;
04487 
04488 UINT32 UIHandleLCOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04489 {
04490       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
04491       INT16                                     sFacingDir, sXPos, sYPos;
04492       UINT16                              usAnimState;
04493 
04494       guiNewUICursor = LOOK_UICURSOR;                       
04495 
04496       // Get soldier
04497       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
04498       {
04499             return( GAME_SCREEN );
04500       }
04501 
04502       gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
04503 
04504       gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 14;
04505       gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 7;
04506 
04507 
04508       // Get soldier
04509       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
04510       {
04511             return( GAME_SCREEN );
04512       }
04513 
04514       GetMouseXY( &sXPos, &sYPos );
04515 
04516       // Get direction from mouse pos
04517       sFacingDir = GetDirectionFromXY( sXPos, sYPos, pSoldier );
04518 
04519       // Set # of APs
04520       if ( sFacingDir != pSoldier->bDirection )
04521       {
04522             gsCurrentActionPoints = GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
04523             gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = FALSE;
04524       }
04525       else
04526       {
04527             usAnimState = PickSoldierReadyAnimation( pSoldier, FALSE );
04528 
04529             if( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION )
04530             {
04531                   gsCurrentActionPoints = GetAPsToReadyWeapon( pSoldier, usAnimState );// Madd: removed the next part since it was deducting 2 extra aps that would not be deducted when readying the old way //+ AP_TO_AIM_TILE_IF_GETTING_READY;
04532             }
04533             else if( pSoldier->sLastTarget != sXPos + (MAXCOL * sYPos ) )
04534                   gsCurrentActionPoints = AP_TO_AIM_TILE_IF_ALREADY_READY;
04535             else
04536                   gsCurrentActionPoints = 0;
04537 
04538             gfUIHandleShowMoveGrid = TRUE;
04539             gsUIHandleShowMoveGridLocation = sXPos + (MAXCOL * sYPos );
04540 
04541             gubShowActionPointsInRed = 5;
04542             //gfDisplayFullCountRingBurst = FALSE;
04543       }
04544 
04545       // Determine if we can afford!
04546       if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
04547       {  
04548             gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
04549       }
04550 
04551       HandleSight( pSoldier, SIGHT_LOOK ); 
04552 
04553       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04554 
04555 }
04556

04558 UINT32 UIHandleLCChangeToLook( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04559 {
04560       ErasePath( TRUE );
04561 
04562       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04563 }
04564 
04565 
04566 BOOLEAN MakeSoldierTurn( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos )
04567 {
04568       INT16                                     sFacingDir, sAPCost, sAPCostToReady;
04569       UINT16                                          usAnimState;
04570 
04571       // Get direction from mouse pos
04572       sFacingDir = GetDirectionFromXY( sXPos, sYPos, pSoldier );
04573 
04574       if ( sFacingDir != pSoldier->bDirection )
04575       {
04576             sAPCost = GetAPsToLook( pSoldier );
04577 
04578             // Check AP cost...
04579             if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04580             {
04581                   return( FALSE );
04582             }
04583 
04584             // ATE: make stationary if...
04585             if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
04586             {
04587                   SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
04588             }
04589 
04590             //DEF:  made it an event
04591             SendSoldierSetDesiredDirectionEvent( pSoldier, sFacingDir );
04592 
04593             pSoldier->bTurningFromUI = TRUE;
04594 
04595             // ATE: Hard-code here previous event to ui busy event...
04596             guiOldEvent = LA_BEGINUIOURTURNLOCK;
04597 
04598             return( TRUE );
04599       }
04600       else
04601       {
04602             usAnimState = PickSoldierReadyAnimation( pSoldier, FALSE );
04603 
04604             sAPCostToReady = 0;
04605 
04606             if( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION )
04607             {
04608                   sAPCostToReady = GetAPsToReadyWeapon( pSoldier, usAnimState );
04609                   sAPCost = sAPCostToReady; // Madd: removed this part since it was costing too many aps to ready weapon -- see other comment //+ AP_TO_AIM_TILE_IF_GETTING_READY;
04610             }
04611             else if( pSoldier->sLastTarget != sXPos + (MAXCOL * sYPos ) )
04612                   sAPCost = AP_TO_AIM_TILE_IF_ALREADY_READY;
04613             else
04614                   return FALSE;
04615 
04616 
04617             // Check AP cost...
04618             if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
04619             {
04620                   return( FALSE );
04621             }
04622 
04623             if( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION )
04624                   SoldierReadyWeapon( pSoldier, sXPos, sYPos, FALSE );
04625 
04626             pSoldier->bTurningFromUI = TRUE;
04627             guiOldEvent = LA_BEGINUIOURTURNLOCK;
04628 
04629             // Setting "Last Target"
04630 
04631             pSoldier->sLastTarget = sXPos + (MAXCOL * sYPos);
04632             DeductPoints( pSoldier, (INT16)(sAPCost - sAPCostToReady), 0 );
04633 
04634             HandleSight( pSoldier, SIGHT_LOOK ); 
04635 
04636             return( TRUE );
04637       }
04638 }
04639 
04640 
04641 UINT32 UIHandleLCLook( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04642 {
04643       INT16                                     sXPos, sYPos;
04644       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
04645       INT32                                 cnt;
04646       SOLDIERTYPE               *pFirstSoldier = NULL;
04647 
04648 
04649       if ( !GetMouseXY( &sXPos, &sYPos ) )
04650       {
04651             return( GAME_SCREEN );
04652       }
04653 
04654       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
04655       {
04656             // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
04657             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
04658             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
04659             {
04660                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
04661                   {
04662                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
04663                         {
04664                               MakeSoldierTurn( pSoldier, sXPos, sYPos );                              
04665                         }
04666                   }
04667             }
04668       }
04669       else
04670       {
04671             // Get soldier
04672             if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
04673             {
04674                   return( GAME_SCREEN );
04675             }
04676 
04677             if ( MakeSoldierTurn( pSoldier, sXPos, sYPos ) )
04678             {
04679                   SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );        
04680             }
04681       }
04682       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04683 }
04684 
04685 
04686 
04687 UINT32 UIHandleTOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04688 {
04689       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
04690       UINT8                                     ubTargID;
04691       UINT32                                    uiRange;
04692       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
04693       BOOLEAN                                   fValidTalkableGuy = FALSE;
04694       INT16                                     sTargetGridNo;
04695       INT16                                     sDistVisible;
04696 
04697       // Get soldier
04698       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
04699       {
04700             return( GAME_SCREEN );
04701       }
04702 
04703       if (!GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
04704       {
04705             return( GAME_SCREEN );
04706       }
04707 
04708       if( ValidQuickExchangePosition( ) )
04709       {
04710             // Do new cursor!
04711             guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
04712             return( UIHandleMOnTerrain( pUIEvent ) );       
04713       }
04714 
04715       sTargetGridNo = usMapPos;
04716 
04717 
04718       UIHandleOnMerc( FALSE );
04719 
04720 
04721       //CHECK FOR VALID TALKABLE GUY HERE
04722       fValidTalkableGuy = IsValidTalkableNPCFromMouse( &ubTargID, FALSE, TRUE , FALSE );
04723 
04724       // USe cursor based on distance
04725       // Get distance away
04726       if ( fValidTalkableGuy )
04727       {
04728             sTargetGridNo = MercPtrs[ ubTargID ]->sGridNo;
04729       }
04730 
04731       uiRange = GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo );
04732 
04733 
04734       //ATE: Check if we have good LOS
04735       // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
04736       sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier );
04737 
04738 
04739       if ( uiRange <= NPC_TALK_RADIUS )
04740       {
04741             if ( fValidTalkableGuy )
04742             {
04743                   guiNewUICursor = TALK_A_UICURSOR;                     
04744             }
04745             else
04746             {
04747                   guiNewUICursor = TALK_NA_UICURSOR;                    
04748             }
04749       }
04750       else
04751       {
04752             if ( fValidTalkableGuy )
04753             {
04754                   //guiNewUICursor = TALK_OUT_RANGE_A_UICURSOR;         
04755                   guiNewUICursor = TALK_A_UICURSOR;                                       
04756             }
04757             else
04758             {
04759                   guiNewUICursor = TALK_OUT_RANGE_NA_UICURSOR;                      
04760             }
04761       }
04762       
04763       if ( fValidTalkableGuy )
04764       {
04765             if ( !SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo,  pSoldier->bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
04766             {
04767                   //. ATE: Make range far, so we alternate cursors...
04768                   guiNewUICursor = TALK_OUT_RANGE_A_UICURSOR;           
04769             }
04770       }
04771 
04772        gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
04773 
04774        gUIDisplayActionPointsOffX = 8;
04775        gUIDisplayActionPointsOffY = 3;
04776 
04777        // Set # of APs
04778        gsCurrentActionPoints = 6;
04779 
04780       // Determine if we can afford!
04781       if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
04782       {  
04783             gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
04784       }
04785 
04786       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
04787       {
04788             if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
04789             {
04790                   PauseRT( TRUE );
04791             }
04792             else
04793             {
04794                   PauseRT( FALSE );
04795             }
04796       }
04797 
04798       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04799 
04800 }

04804 {
04805       ErasePath( TRUE );
04806 
04807       return( GAME_SCREEN );

04819 
04820 UINT32 UIHandleLUIBeginLock( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04821 {
04822       // Don't let both versions of the locks to happen at the same time!
04823       // ( They are mutually exclusive )!
04824       UIHandleLAEndLockOurTurn( NULL );
04825 
04826       if ( !gfDisableRegionActive )
04827       {
04828             gfDisableRegionActive = TRUE;
04829 
04830             RemoveTacticalCursor( );
04831             //SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
04832 
04833             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gDisableRegion, 0, 0 ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
04834                                            CURSOR_WAIT, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
04835             // Add region
04836             MSYS_AddRegion( &gDisableRegion );
04837 
04838             //guiPendingOverrideEvent = LOCKUI_MODE;
04839 
04840             // UnPause time!
04841             PauseGame();
04842             LockPauseState( 16 );
04843             
04844       }
04845       
04846       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04847 }
04848 
04849 UINT32 UIHandleLUIEndLock( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
04850 {
04851       if ( gfDisableRegionActive )
04852       {
04853             gfDisableRegionActive = FALSE;
04854 
04855             // Add region
04856             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDisableRegion );           
04857             RefreshMouseRegions( );
04858 
04859             //SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( guiCurrentUICursor );
04860 
04861             guiForceRefreshMousePositionCalculation = TRUE;
04862             UIHandleMOnTerrain( NULL );
04863 
04864         if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
04865             {
04866                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( gUICursors[ guiNewUICursor ].usFreeCursorName );
04867             }
04868 
04869             guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
04870             HandleTacticalUI( );
04871 
04872             // ATE: Only if NOT in conversation!
04873             if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) )
04874             {
04875                   // UnPause time!
04876                   UnLockPauseState();
04877                   UnPauseGame();
04878             }
04879       }
04880 
04881       return( GAME_SCREEN );
04882 }
04883 
04884 
04885 void CheckForDisabledRegionRemove( )
04886 {
04887       if ( gfDisableRegionActive )
04888       {
04889             gfDisableRegionActive = FALSE;
04890 
04891             // Remove region
04892             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gDisableRegion );     
04893     
04894             UnLockPauseState();
04895             UnPauseGame();
04896 
04897       }
04898 
04899       if ( gfUserTurnRegionActive )
04900       {
04901             gfUserTurnRegionActive = FALSE;
04902 
04903             gfUIInterfaceSetBusy = FALSE;
04904 
04905             // Remove region
04906             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gUserTurnRegion );          
04907 
04908             UnLockPauseState();
04909             UnPauseGame();
04910       }
04911 }

04921 
04922 void GetGridNoScreenXY( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 *pScreenX, INT16 *pScreenY )
04923 {
04924       INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
04925       INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
04926       INT16 sTempX_S, sTempY_S;
04927       INT16 sXPos, sYPos;
04928 
04929       ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
04930 
04931       // Get 'TRUE' merc position
04932       sOffsetX = sXPos - gsRenderCenterX;
04933       sOffsetY = sYPos - gsRenderCenterY;
04934 
04935       FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sOffsetX, sOffsetY, &sTempX_S, &sTempY_S );
04936 
04937       sScreenX = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)sTempX_S;
04938       sScreenY = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)sTempY_S;
04939 
04940       // Adjust for offset position on screen
04941       sScreenX -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX;
04942       sScreenY -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY;
04943       sScreenY -= gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
04944 
04945       // Adjust based on interface level
04946 
04947       // Adjust for render height
04948       sScreenY += gsRenderHeight;
04949 
04950       // Adjust y offset!
04951       sScreenY += ( WORLD_TILE_Y/2);
04952 
04953       (*pScreenX) = sScreenX;
04954       (*pScreenY) = sScreenY;
04955 }
04956 
04957 
04958 void EndMultiSoldierSelection( BOOLEAN fAcknowledge )
04959 {
04960       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
04961       INT32                               cnt;
04962       SOLDIERTYPE             *pFirstSoldier = NULL;
04963       BOOLEAN                             fSelectedSoldierInBatch = FALSE;
04964 
04965       
04966       gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect = FALSE;
04967       
04968 
04969       // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
04970       // check if our currently selected guy is amoung the
04971       // lucky few.. if not, change to a guy who is...
04972       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
04973       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
04974       {
04975             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
04976             {
04977                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
04978                   {
04979                         gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect = TRUE;
04980 
04981                         if ( pSoldier->ubID != gusSelectedSoldier && pFirstSoldier == NULL )
04982                         {
04983                               pFirstSoldier = pSoldier;
04984                         }
04985 
04986                         if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
04987                         {
04988                               fSelectedSoldierInBatch = TRUE;
04989                         }
04990 
04991                         if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MUTE_CONFIRMATIONS ] && fAcknowledge )
04992                               InternalDoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_ATTN1, BATTLE_SND_LOWER_VOLUME );
04993 
04994                         if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
04995                         {
04996                               PutMercInAwakeState( pSoldier );
04997                         }
04998                   }
04999             }
05000       }
05001 
05002       // If here, select the first guy...
05003       if ( pFirstSoldier != NULL && !fSelectedSoldierInBatch )
05004       {
05005             SelectSoldier( pFirstSoldier->ubID, TRUE, TRUE );
05006       }
05007 
05008 }
05009 
05010 
05011 void StopRubberBandedMercFromMoving( )
05012 {
05013       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05014       INT32                               cnt;
05015       SOLDIERTYPE             *pFirstSoldier = NULL;
05016       
05017 
05018       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect )
05019       {
05020             return;
05021       }
05022       
05023       // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
05024       // check if our currently selected guy is amoung the
05025       // lucky few.. if not, change to a guy who is...
05026       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05027       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05028       {
05029             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05030             {
05031                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05032                   {
05033                         pSoldier->fDelayedMovement = FALSE;
05034                         pSoldier->sFinalDestination = pSoldier->sGridNo;
05035                         StopSoldier( pSoldier );
05036                   }
05037             }
05038       }
05039 
05040 }
05041 
05042 
05043 void EndRubberBanding( )
05044 {
05045       if ( gRubberBandActive  )
05046       {
05047             FreeMouseCursor( );
05048             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
05049 
05050             EndMultiSoldierSelection( TRUE );
05051 
05052             gRubberBandActive = FALSE;
05053       }
05054 }
05055 
05056 
05057 BOOLEAN HandleMultiSelectionMove( INT16 sDestGridNo )
05058 {
05059       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05060       INT32                               cnt;
05061       BOOLEAN                             fAtLeastOneMultiSelect = FALSE;
05062       BOOLEAN                             fMoveFast = FALSE;
05063 
05064       // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
05065       // Make them move....
05066 
05067       // Do a loop first to see if the selected guy is told to go fast...
05068       gfGetNewPathThroughPeople = TRUE;
05069 
05070       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05071       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05072       {
05073             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05074             {
05075                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05076                   {
05077                         if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
05078                         {
05079                               fMoveFast = pSoldier->fUIMovementFast;
05080                               break;
05081                         }
05082                   }
05083             }
05084       }
05085 
05086       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05087       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05088       {
05089             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05090             {
05091                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05092                   {
05093             // If we can't be controlled, returninvalid...
05094             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
05095             {
05096                   if ( !CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
05097           {
05098             continue;
05099           }
05100         }
05101 
05102                         pSoldier->fUIMovementFast  = fMoveFast;
05103                         pSoldier->usUIMovementMode =  GetMoveStateBasedOnStance( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight );
05104 
05105                         pSoldier->fUIMovementFast  = FALSE;
05106 
05107                         if ( gUIUseReverse )
05108                         {
05109                               pSoldier->bReverse = TRUE;
05110                         }
05111                         else
05112                         {
05113                               pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
05114                         }
05115 
05116                         // Remove any previous actions
05117                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
05118 
05119                         
05120                         if ( EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sDestGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode , TRUE, pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove ) )
05121                         {
05122                               InternalDoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_OK1, BATTLE_SND_LOWER_VOLUME );
05123                         }
05124                         else
05125                         {
05126                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH_FOR_MERC ], pSoldier->name );
05127                         }
05128 
05129                         fAtLeastOneMultiSelect = TRUE;
05130                   }
05131             }
05132       }
05133       gfGetNewPathThroughPeople = FALSE;
05134 
05135       return( fAtLeastOneMultiSelect );
05136 }
05137 
05138 
05139 void ResetMultiSelection( )
05140 {
05141       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05142       INT32                               cnt;
05143 
05144       // OK, loop through all guys who are 'multi-selected' and
05145       // Make them move....
05146 
05147       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05148       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05149       {
05150             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
05151             {
05152                   if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED )
05153                   {
05154                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED );
05155                   }
05156             }
05157       }
05158 
05159       gTacticalStatus.fAtLeastOneGuyOnMultiSelect = FALSE;
05160 }

05162 
05163 
05164 UINT32 UIHandleRubberBandOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
05165 {
05166       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
05167       INT32                               cnt;
05168       INT16                               sScreenX, sScreenY;
05169       INT32                               iTemp;
05170       SGPRect                             aRect;
05171   BOOLEAN         fAtLeastOne = FALSE;
05172 
05173       guiNewUICursor = NO_UICURSOR;
05174       //SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
05175 
05176       gRubberBandRect.iRight  = gusMouseXPos;
05177       gRubberBandRect.iBottom = gusMouseYPos;
05178 
05179       // Copy into temp rect
05180       memcpy( &aRect, &gRubberBandRect, sizeof( gRubberBandRect ) );
05181 
05182       if ( aRect.iRight < aRect.iLeft )
05183       {
05184             iTemp = aRect.iLeft;
05185             aRect.iLeft  = aRect.iRight;
05186             aRect.iRight = iTemp;
05187       }
05188 
05189 
05190       if ( aRect.iBottom < aRect.iTop )
05191       {
05192             iTemp = aRect.iTop;
05193             aRect.iTop        = aRect.iBottom;
05194             aRect.iBottom = iTemp;
05195       }
05196 
05197       // ATE:Check at least for one guy that's in point!
05198       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05199       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05200       {
05201             // Check if this guy is OK to control....
05202             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) ) )
05203             {
05204                   // Get screen pos of gridno......
05205                   GetGridNoScreenXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
05206 
05207                   // ATE: If we are in a hiehger interface level, subttrasct....
05208                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 1 )
05209                   {
05210                         sScreenY -= 50;
05211                   }
05212 
05213                   if ( IsPointInScreenRect( sScreenX, sScreenY, &aRect ) )
05214                   {
05215         fAtLeastOne = TRUE;
05216                   }
05217             }
05218       }
05219 
05220   if ( !fAtLeastOne )
05221   {
05222     return( GAME_SCREEN );
05223   }
05224 
05225       // ATE: Now loop through our guys and see if any fit!
05226       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05227       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
05228       {
05229 
05230             // Check if this guy is OK to control....
05231             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_VEHICLE | SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) ) )
05232             {
05233                   if ( !_KeyDown( ALT ) )
05234                   {
05235                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED );
05236                   }
05237 
05238                   // Get screen pos of gridno......
05239                   GetGridNoScreenXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sScreenX, &sScreenY );
05240 
05241                   // ATE: If we are in a hiehger interface level, subttrasct....
05242                   if ( gsInterfaceLevel == 1 )
05243                   {
05244                         sScreenY -= 50;
05245                   }
05246 
05247                   if ( IsPointInScreenRect( sScreenX, sScreenY, &aRect ) )
05248                   {
05249                         // Adjust this guy's flag...
05250                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_MULTI_SELECTED;
05251                   }
05252             }
05253       }
05254 
05255 
05256       return( GAME_SCREEN );
05257 }
05258 
05259 
05260 UINT32 UIHandleJumpOverOnTerrain( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
05261 {
05262       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05263       UINT16                  usMapPos;
05264 
05265       // Here, first get map screen
05266       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
05267       {
05268             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05269       }
05270 
05271       if (!GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
05272       {
05273             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05274       }
05275 
05276       if ( !IsValidJumpLocation( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE ) )
05277       {
05278             guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
05279             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05280       }
05281 
05282       // Display APs....
05283       gsCurrentActionPoints = GetAPsToJumpOver( pSoldier );
05284 
05285   gfUIDisplayActionPoints            = TRUE;
05286       gfUIDisplayActionPointsCenter = TRUE;
05287 
05288       guiNewUICursor = JUMP_OVER_UICURSOR;
05289 
05290       return( GAME_SCREEN );
05291 }
05292 
05293 
05294 UINT32 UIHandleJumpOver( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
05295 {
05296       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
05297       UINT16                  usMapPos;
05298       INT8                    bDirection;
05299 
05300       // Here, first get map screen
05301       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
05302       {
05303             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05304       }
05305 
05306       if (!GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
05307       {
05308             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05309       }
05310 
05311       if ( !IsValidJumpLocation( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE ) )
05312       {
05313             return( GAME_SCREEN );
05314       }
05315 
05316       SetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
05317 
05318       // OK, Start jumping!
05319       // Remove any previous actions
05320       pSoldier->ubPendingAction            = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
05321 
05322       // Get direction to goto....
05323       bDirection = (INT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( usMapPos, pSoldier );
05324 
05325 
05326       pSoldier->fDontChargeTurningAPs = TRUE;
05327       EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, bDirection, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
05328       pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone = TRUE;
05329       // ATE: Reset flag to go back to prone...
05330       //pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition = TURNING_FROM_PRONE_OFF;
05331       pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = JUMP_OVER_BLOCKING_PERSON;
05332 
05333 
05334       return( GAME_SCREEN );
05335 }
05336 
05337 UINT32 UIHandleLABeginLockOurTurn( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
05338 {
05339       // Don't let both versions of the locks to happen at the same time!
05340       // ( They are mutually exclusive )!
05341       UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
05342 
05343       if ( !gfUserTurnRegionActive )
05344       {
05345             gfUserTurnRegionActive = TRUE;
05346 
05347             gfUIInterfaceSetBusy = TRUE;
05348             guiUIInterfaceBusyTime = GetJA2Clock( );
05349 
05350             //guiNewUICursor = NO_UICURSOR;
05351             //SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
05352 
05353             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gUserTurnRegion, 0, 0 ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
05354                                            CURSOR_WAIT, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
05355             // Add region
05356             MSYS_AddRegion( &gUserTurnRegion );
05357 
05358             //guiPendingOverrideEvent = LOCKOURTURN_UI_MODE;
05359 
05360             ErasePath( TRUE );
05361 
05362             // Pause time!
05363             PauseGame();
05364             LockPauseState( 17 );
05365       }
05366 
05367       return( GAME_SCREEN );
05368 }
05369 
05370 UINT32 UIHandleLAEndLockOurTurn( UI_EVENT *pUIEvent )
05371 {
05372       if ( gfUserTurnRegionActive )
05373       {
05374             gfUserTurnRegionActive = FALSE;
05375 
05376             gfUIInterfaceSetBusy = FALSE;
05377 
05378             // Add region
05379             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gUserTurnRegion );          
05380             RefreshMouseRegions( );
05381             //SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( guiCurrentUICursor );
05382 
05383             gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05384 
05385             guiForceRefreshMousePositionCalculation = TRUE;
05386             UIHandleMOnTerrain( NULL );
05387 
05388         if ( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
05389             {
05390                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( gUICursors[ guiNewUICursor ].usFreeCursorName );
05391             }
05392             guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
05393             HandleTacticalUI( );
05394 
05395             TurnOffTeamsMuzzleFlashes( gbPlayerNum );
05396 
05397             // UnPause time!
05398             UnLockPauseState();
05399             UnPauseGame();
05400       }
05401 
05402       return( GAME_SCREEN );
05403 }
