05405 
05406 
05407 BOOLEAN IsValidTalkableNPCFromMouse( UINT8 *pubSoldierID , BOOLEAN fGive, BOOLEAN fAllowMercs, BOOLEAN fCheckCollapsed )
05408 {
05409       // Check if there is a guy here to talk to!
05410       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
05411       {
05412                   *pubSoldierID = (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID;
05413                   return( IsValidTalkableNPC( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID, fGive, fAllowMercs, fCheckCollapsed ) );
05414       }
05415 
05416       return( FALSE );
05417 }
05418 
05419 
05420 BOOLEAN IsValidTalkableNPC( UINT8 ubSoldierID, BOOLEAN fGive , BOOLEAN fAllowMercs, BOOLEAN fCheckCollapsed )
05421 {
05422       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
05423       BOOLEAN                 fValidGuy = FALSE;
05424 
05425 
05426       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
05427       {
05428             if ( AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ] ) )
05429             {
05430                   return( FALSE );
05431             }
05432       }
05433 
05434       // CHECK IF ACTIVE!
05435       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
05436       {
05437             return( FALSE );
05438       }
05439 
05440       // CHECK IF DEAD
05441       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
05442       {
05443             return( FALSE );
05444       }
05445 
05446   if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed && fCheckCollapsed )
05447   {
05448     return( FALSE );
05449   }
05450 
05451       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
05452       {
05453             return( FALSE );
05454       }
05455 
05456 
05457       // IF BAD GUY - CHECK VISIVILITY
05458       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
05459       {
05460             if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) )
05461             {
05462                   return( FALSE  );
05463             }
05464       }
05465 
05466       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->ubProfile >= FIRST_RPC && pSoldier->ubProfile < GASTON && !RPC_RECRUITED( pSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
05467       {
05468             fValidGuy = TRUE;
05469       }
05470 
05471       // Check for EPC...
05472       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && ( gCurrentUIMode == TALKCURSOR_MODE || fGive )  && AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
05473       {
05474             fValidGuy = TRUE;
05475       }
05476 
05477       // ATE: We can talk to our own teammates....
05478       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && fAllowMercs  )
05479       {
05480             fValidGuy = TRUE;
05481       }
05482 
05483       if ( GetCivType( pSoldier ) != CIV_TYPE_NA && !fGive )
05484       {
05485             fValidGuy = TRUE;
05486       }
05487 
05488       // Alright, let's do something special here for robot...
05489       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
05490       {
05491             if ( fValidGuy == TRUE && !fGive )
05492             {
05493                   // Can't talk to robots!
05494                   fValidGuy = FALSE;
05495             }
05496       }
05497 
05498       // OK, check if they are stationary or not....
05499       // Do some checks common to all..
05500       if ( fValidGuy )
05501       {
05502             if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_MOVING ) && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
05503             {
05504                   return( FALSE );
05505             }
05506 
05507             return( TRUE );
05508       }
05509 
05510       return( FALSE );
05511 }
05512 
05513 
05514 BOOLEAN HandleTalkInit(  )
05515 {
05516       INT16                                 sAPCost;
05517       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier, *pTSoldier;
05518       UINT32                                    uiRange;
05519       UINT16                                    usMapPos;
05520       INT16                                     sGoodGridNo;
05521       UINT8                                     ubNewDirection;
05522       UINT8                                     ubQuoteNum;
05523       UINT8                                     ubDiceRoll;
05524       INT16                                     sDistVisible;
05525       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
05526       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
05527       UINT8                                     commandRange; //lal
05528 
05529       // Get soldier
05530       if ( !GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier )  )
05531       {
05532             return( FALSE );
05533       }
05534 
05535       if (!GetMouseMapPos( &usMapPos ) )
05536       {
05537             return( FALSE );
05538       }
05539 
05540       // Check if there is a guy here to talk to!
05541       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
05542       {
05543             // Is he a valid NPC?
05544             if ( IsValidTalkableNPC( (UINT8)gusUIFullTargetID, FALSE, TRUE , FALSE ) )
05545             {
05546                   GetSoldier( &pTSoldier, gusUIFullTargetID );
05547 
05548                   if ( pTSoldier->ubID != pSoldier->ubID )
05549                   {
05550                         if ( !(( pTSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM ) && ( CheckIfRadioIsEquipped() )) ) //lal 
05551                         {
05552                               //ATE: Check if we have good LOS
05553                               // is he close enough to see that gridno if he turns his head?
05554                           sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, pTSoldier->sGridNo, pTSoldier->bLevel, pTSoldier );
05555 
05556                               // Check LOS!
05557                               if ( !SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pTSoldier->sGridNo,  pTSoldier->bLevel, 3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
05558                               {
05559                                     if ( pTSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
05560                                     {
05561                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_LOS_TO_TALK_TARGET ], pSoldier->name, pTSoldier->name );
05562                                     }
05563                                     else
05564                                     {
05565                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 45 ], pSoldier->name );
05566                                     }
05567                                     return( FALSE );
05568                               }
05569                         }
05570                   }
05571 
05572                   if ( pTSoldier->bCollapsed )
05573                   {
05574                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 21 ], pTSoldier->name );
05575                         return( FALSE );
05576                   }
05577 
05578                   // If Q on, turn off.....
05579                   if ( guiCurrentScreen == DEBUG_SCREEN )
05580                   {           
05581                         gfExitDebugScreen = TRUE;
05582                   }
05583 
05584                   // ATE: if our own guy...
05585                   if ( pTSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !AM_AN_EPC( pTSoldier ) )
05586                   {
05587                         if ( pTSoldier->ubProfile == DIMITRI )
05588                         {
05589                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 32 ], pTSoldier->name );
05590                               return( FALSE );
05591                         }
05592 
05593                         // Randomize quote to use....
05594 
05595                         // If buddy had a social trait...
05596                         if ( gMercProfiles[ pTSoldier->ubProfile ].bAttitude != ATT_NORMAL )
05597                         {
05598                               ubDiceRoll = (UINT8)Random( 3 );
05599                         }
05600                         else
05601                         {
05602                               ubDiceRoll = (UINT8)Random( 2 );
05603                         }
05604 
05605                         // If we are a PC, only use 0
05606                         if ( pTSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER )
05607                         {
05608                               ubDiceRoll = 0;
05609                         }
05610 
05611                         switch( ubDiceRoll )
05612                         {
05613                         case 0:
05614 
05615                               ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_NEGATIVE_COMPANY;
05616                               break;
05617 
05618                         case 1:
05619 
05620                               if ( QuoteExp_PassingDislike[ pTSoldier->ubProfile ] )
05621                               {
05622                                     ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_PASSING_DISLIKE;
05623                               }
05624                               else
05625                               {
05626                                     ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_NEGATIVE_COMPANY;
05627                               }
05628                               break;
05629 
05630                         case 2:
05631 
05632                               ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_SOCIAL_TRAIT;
05633                               break;
05634 
05635                         default:
05636 
05637                               ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_NEGATIVE_COMPANY;
05638                               break;
05639                         }
05640 
05641                         if ( pTSoldier->ubProfile == IRA )
05642                         {
05643                               ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_PASSING_DISLIKE;
05644                         }
05645 
05646                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTSoldier, ubQuoteNum );
05647 
05648                         return( FALSE );
05649                   }
05650 
05651                   // Check distance
05652                   uiRange = GetRangeFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, usMapPos );
05653 
05654                   // Double check path
05655                   if ( GetCivType( pTSoldier ) != CIV_TYPE_NA )
05656                   {
05657                         // ATE: If one is already active, just remove it!
05658                         if ( ShutDownQuoteBoxIfActive( ) )
05659                         {
05660                               return( FALSE );
05661                         }
05662                   }
05663 
05664                   //lal
05665                   if ( pTSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
05666                   {
05667                         commandRange = NPC_TALK_RADIUS*3;
05668                   }
05669                   else
05670                   {
05671                         commandRange = NPC_TALK_RADIUS;
05672                   }
05673 
05674 
05675                   if ( ( uiRange > commandRange ) && ( !CheckIfRadioIsEquipped() ) ) //lal
05676                   {
05677                         // First get an adjacent gridno....
05678                         sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, pTSoldier->sGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
05679 
05680                         if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
05681                         {
05682                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
05683                               return( FALSE );
05684                         }
05685 
05686                         if ( UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sActionGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, FALSE, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints ) == 0 )
05687                         {
05688                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH ] );
05689                               return( FALSE );
05690                         }
05691 
05692                         // Walk up and talk to buddy....
05693                         gfNPCCircularDistLimit = TRUE;
05694                         sGoodGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( pSoldier, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, pTSoldier->sGridNo, (NPC_TALK_RADIUS-1), &ubNewDirection, TRUE );
05695                         gfNPCCircularDistLimit = FALSE;
05696 
05697                         // First calculate APs and validate...
05698                         sAPCost = AP_TALK;                        
05699                         //sAPCost += UIPlotPath( pSoldier, sGoodGridNo, NO_COPYROUTE, FALSE, TEMPORARY, (UINT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
05700 
05701                         // Check AP cost...
05702                         if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
05703                         {
05704                               return( FALSE );
05705                         }
05706 
05707                         // Now walkup to talk....
05708                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_TALK;
05709                         pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = pTSoldier->ubID;
05710                         pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
05711 
05712                         // WALK UP TO DEST FIRST
05713                         EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, sGoodGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode , TRUE , pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove );                            
05714 
05715                         return( FALSE );
05716                   }
05717                   else
05718                   {
05719                         sAPCost = AP_TALK;
05720 
05721                         // Check AP cost...
05722                         if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, TRUE ) )
05723                         {
05724                               return( FALSE );
05725                         }
05726 
05727                         // OK, startup!
05728                         PlayerSoldierStartTalking( pSoldier, pTSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
05729                   }
05730 
05731                   if ( GetCivType( pTSoldier ) != CIV_TYPE_NA )
05732                   {
05733                         return( FALSE );
05734                   }
05735                   else
05736                   {
05737                         return( TRUE );
05738                   }
05739             }
05740       }
05741 
05742       return( FALSE );
05743 }
05744

05747 void SetUIBusy( UINT8 ubID )
05748 {
05749       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) && ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
05750       {
05751             if ( gusSelectedSoldier == ubID )
05752             {
05753                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = LA_BEGINUIOURTURNLOCK;
05754                   HandleTacticalUI( );
05755             }
05756       }
05757 }
05758 
05759 void UnSetUIBusy( UINT8 ubID )
05760 {
05761       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) && ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
05762       {
05763             if ( !gTacticalStatus.fUnLockUIAfterHiddenInterrupt )
05764             {
05765                   if ( gusSelectedSoldier == ubID )
05766                   {
05767                         guiPendingOverrideEvent = LA_ENDUIOUTURNLOCK;
05768                         HandleTacticalUI( );
05769 
05770                         // Set grace period...
05771                         gTacticalStatus.uiTactialTurnLimitClock = GetJA2Clock( );
05772                   }
05773             }
05774             // player getting control back so reset all muzzle flashes
05775       }
05776 }

05784       guiTimerCursorDelay  = uiDelay;

05787 
05788 
05789 INT8 UIHandleInteractiveTilesAndItemsOnTerrain( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 usMapPos, BOOLEAN fUseOKCursor, BOOLEAN fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles )
05790 {
05791       ITEM_POOL                           *pItemPool;
05792       BOOLEAN                                   fSetCursor;
05793       UINT32                                    uiCursorFlags;
05794       LEVELNODE                           *pIntTile;
05795       static BOOLEAN          fOverPool = FALSE;
05796       static BOOLEAN          fOverEnemy = FALSE;
05797       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
05798       INT16                                     sIntTileGridNo;
05799       BOOLEAN                                   fContinue = TRUE;
05800       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure = NULL;
05801       BOOLEAN                                   fPoolContainsHiddenItems = FALSE;
05802       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTSoldier;
05803 
05804 
05805       if ( gfResetUIItemCursorOptimization )
05806       {
05807             gfResetUIItemCursorOptimization = FALSE;
05808             fOverPool = FALSE;
05809             fOverEnemy = FALSE;
05810       }
05811 
05812       GetCursorMovementFlags( &uiCursorFlags );
05813 
05814       // Default gridno to mouse pos
05815       sActionGridNo = usMapPos;
05816 
05817       // Look for being on a merc....
05818       // Steal.....
05819       UIHandleOnMerc( FALSE );
05820 
05821       gfBeginVehicleCursor = FALSE;
05822 
05823       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound  )
05824       {
05825              pTSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
05826 
05827              if ( OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( pTSoldier ) && pTSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
05828              {
05829                         // grab number of occupants in vehicles
05830                         if ( fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles )
05831                         {
05832                               if ( !OKUseVehicle( pTSoldier->ubProfile ) )
05833                               {
05834                                     // Set UI CURSOR....
05835                                     guiNewUICursor = CANNOT_MOVE_UICURSOR;    
05836 
05837                                     gfBeginVehicleCursor = TRUE;
05838                                     return( 1 );
05839                               }
05840                               else
05841                               {
05842                                     if ( GetNumberInVehicle( pTSoldier->bVehicleID ) == 0 )
05843                                     {
05844                                           // Set UI CURSOR....
05845                                           guiNewUICursor = ENTER_VEHICLE_UICURSOR;  
05846 
05847                                           gfBeginVehicleCursor = TRUE;
05848                                           return( 1 );
05849                                     }
05850                               }
05851                         }
05852                         else
05853                         {
05854                               // Set UI CURSOR....
05855                               guiNewUICursor = ENTER_VEHICLE_UICURSOR;  
05856                               return( 1 );
05857                         }
05858              }
05859 
05860              if ( !fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles )
05861              {
05862                    if ( ( guiUIFullTargetFlags & ENEMY_MERC ) && !( guiUIFullTargetFlags & UNCONSCIOUS_MERC ) )
05863                    {
05864                               if ( !fOverEnemy )
05865                               {
05866                                     fOverEnemy = TRUE;
05867                                     gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05868                               }
05869 
05870                               //Set UI CURSOR
05871                               if ( fUseOKCursor || ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) ) )
05872                               {
05873                                     guiNewUICursor = OKHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR;   
05874                               }
05875                               else
05876                               {
05877                                     guiNewUICursor = NORMALHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR;     
05878                               }
05879 
05880                               fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sActionGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_STEAL );
05881 
05882                               // Display action points
05883                               gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
05884 
05885                               // Determine if we can afford!
05886                               if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
05887                               {  
05888                                     gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
05889                               }
05890 
05891                               return( 0 );
05892                    }
05893              }
05894       }
05895 
05896       if ( fOverEnemy )
05897       {
05898             ErasePath( TRUE );
05899             fOverEnemy = FALSE;
05900             gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05901       }
05902 
05903       // If we are over an interactive struct, adjust gridno to this....
05904       pIntTile                                                                 = ConditionalGetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sIntTileGridNo , &pStructure, FALSE );
05905       gpInvTileThatCausedMoveConfirm = pIntTile;
05906 
05907       if ( pIntTile != NULL )
05908       {
05909             sActionGridNo = sIntTileGridNo;
05910       }
05911 
05912       // Check if we are over an item pool
05913       if ( GetItemPool( sActionGridNo, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
05914       {
05915             // If we want only on int tiles, and we have no int tiles.. ignore items!
05916             if ( fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles && pIntTile == NULL  ) 
05917             {
05918 
05919             }
05920             else if ( fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles && pIntTile != NULL && ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_HASITEMONTOP ) )
05921             {
05922                   // if in this mode, we don't want to automatically show hand cursor over items on strucutres
05923             }
05924             //else if ( pIntTile != NULL && ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH | STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) ) )
05925             else if ( pIntTile != NULL && ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) ) )
05926             {
05927                   // We don't want switches messing around with items ever!
05928             }
05929             else if ( ( pIntTile != NULL && ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) ) ) && ( sActionGridNo != usMapPos || fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles ) )
05930             {
05931                   // Next we look for if we are over a door and if the mouse position is != base door position, ignore items!
05932             }
05933             else 
05934             {
05935                   fPoolContainsHiddenItems = DoesItemPoolContainAnyHiddenItems( pItemPool );
05936 
05937                   // Adjust this if we have not visited this gridno yet...
05938                   if ( fPoolContainsHiddenItems )
05939                   {
05940                         if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sActionGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) )
05941                         {
05942                               fPoolContainsHiddenItems = FALSE;
05943                         }
05944                   }
05945 
05946                   if ( ITEMPOOL_VISIBLE( pItemPool ) || fPoolContainsHiddenItems )
05947                   {
05948 
05949                         if ( !fOverPool )
05950                         {
05951                               fOverPool = TRUE;
05952                               gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05953                         }
05954 
05955                         //Set UI CURSOR
05956                         if ( fUseOKCursor || ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) ) )
05957                         {
05958                               guiNewUICursor = OKHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR;   
05959                         }
05960                         else
05961                         {
05962                               guiNewUICursor = NORMALHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR;     
05963                         }
05964 
05965                         fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sActionGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_ITEMS );
05966 
05967                         // Display action points
05968                         gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
05969 
05970                         if ( gsOverItemsGridNo == sActionGridNo )
05971                         {
05972                               gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05973                         }
05974 
05975                         // Determine if we can afford!
05976                         if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
05977                         {  
05978                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
05979                         }
05980 
05981                         fContinue = FALSE;
05982                   }
05983             }
05984       }
05985 
05986       if ( fContinue )
05987       {
05988             // Try interactive tiles now....
05989             if ( pIntTile != NULL )
05990             {
05991                   if ( fOverPool )
05992                   {
05993                         ErasePath( TRUE );
05994                         fOverPool = FALSE;
05995                         gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
05996                   }
05997 
05998                   HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, usMapPos, MOVEUI_TARGET_INTTILES );
05999 
06000                   //Set UI CURSOR
06001                   guiNewUICursor = GetInteractiveTileCursor( guiNewUICursor, fUseOKCursor  );
06002             }
06003             else
06004             {
06005                   if ( !fItemsOnlyIfOnIntTiles )
06006                   {
06007                         // Let's at least show where the merc will walk to if they go here...
06008                         if ( !fOverPool )
06009                         {
06010                               fOverPool = TRUE;
06011                               gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
06012                         }
06013 
06014                         fSetCursor =  HandleUIMovementCursor( pSoldier, uiCursorFlags, sActionGridNo, MOVEUI_TARGET_ITEMS );
06015 
06016                         // Display action points
06017                         gfUIDisplayActionPoints = TRUE;
06018 
06019                         // Determine if we can afford!
06020                         if ( !EnoughPoints( pSoldier, gsCurrentActionPoints, 0, FALSE ) )
06021                         {  
06022                               gfUIDisplayActionPointsInvalid = TRUE;
06023                         }
06024                   }                 
06025             }
06026 
06027       }
06028       
06029       if ( pIntTile == NULL )
06030       {
06031             return( 0 );
06032       }
06033       else
06034       {
06035             return( 1 );
06036       }
06037 }

06045

06047 
06048       (*(GameScreens[GAME_SCREEN].HandleScreen))();
06049 
06050       gfTacticalForceNoCursor = FALSE;
06051 
06052       SetUICursor( guiCurrentUICursor );
06053 }

06055 
06056 BOOLEAN SelectedGuyInBusyAnimation( )
06057 {
06058       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
06059 
06060       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
06061       {
06062             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ];
06063 
06064             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == LOB_ITEM || 
06065                          pSoldier->usAnimState == THROW_ITEM ||
06066                          pSoldier->usAnimState == PICKUP_ITEM ||
06067                          pSoldier->usAnimState == DROP_ITEM ||
06068                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_DOOR ||
06069                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_STRUCT ||
06070                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_STRUCT ||
06071                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPEN_DOOR ||
06072                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR ||
06073                          pSoldier->usAnimState == ADJACENT_GET_ITEM ||
06074          pSoldier->usAnimState == DROP_ADJACENT_OBJECT ||
06075 
06076                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_DOOR_CROUCHED ||
06077                          pSoldier->usAnimState == BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT_CROUCHED ||
06078                          pSoldier->usAnimState == CLOSE_DOOR_CROUCHED ||
06079                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_DOOR_CROUCHED ||
06080                          pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_STRUCT_CROUCHED ||
06081                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPENSTRUCT_CROUCHED ||
06082                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPEN_DOOR_CROUCHED ||
06083                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPEN_LOCKED_DOOR_CROUCHED ||
06084                          pSoldier->usAnimState == END_OPENSTRUCT_LOCKED_CROUCHED ||
06085                          pSoldier->usAnimState == BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT )
06086             {
06087                   return( TRUE );
06088             }
06089       }
06090 
06091       return( FALSE );
06092 }
06093 
06094 void GotoHeigherStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06095 {
06096       BOOLEAN                                   fNearHeigherLevel;
06097       BOOLEAN                                   fNearLowerLevel;
06098 
06099       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
06100       {
06101             case ANIM_STAND:
06102 
06103                   // Nowhere
06104                   // Try to climb
06105                   GetMercClimbDirection( pSoldier->ubID, &fNearLowerLevel, &fNearHeigherLevel );
06106 
06107                   if ( fNearHeigherLevel )
06108                   {
06109                         BeginSoldierClimbUpRoof( pSoldier );
06110                   }
06111                   break;
06112 
06113             case ANIM_CROUCH:
06114 
06115                   HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( ANIM_STAND );
06116                   break;
06117 
06118             case ANIM_PRONE:
06119 
06120                   HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( ANIM_CROUCH );
06121                   break;
06122       }
06123 }
06124 
06125 
06126 void GotoLowerStance( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
06127 {
06128       BOOLEAN                                   fNearHeigherLevel;
06129       BOOLEAN                                   fNearLowerLevel;
06130 
06131 
06132       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
06133       {
06134             case ANIM_STAND:
06135 
06136                   HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( ANIM_CROUCH );
06137                   break;
06138 
06139             case ANIM_CROUCH:
06140 
06141                   HandleStanceChangeFromUIKeys( ANIM_PRONE );
06142                   break;
06143 
06144             case ANIM_PRONE:
06145 
06146                   // Nowhere
06147                   // Try to climb
06148                   GetMercClimbDirection( pSoldier->ubID, &fNearLowerLevel, &fNearHeigherLevel );
06149 
06150                   if ( fNearLowerLevel )
06151                   {
06152                         BeginSoldierClimbDownRoof( pSoldier );
06153                   }
06154                   break;
06155       }
06156 }
06157 
06158 void SetInterfaceHeightLevel( )
06159 {
06160       INT16 sHeight;
06161       static INT16 sOldHeight = 0;
06162       INT16 sGridNo;
06163 
06164       if( gfBasement || gfCaves )
06165       {
06166             gsRenderHeight = 0;
06167             sOldHeight = 0;
06168 
06169             return;
06170       }
06171 
06172 
06173       // ATE: Use an entry point to determine what height to use....
06174       if( gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo != -1 )
06175             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sNorthGridNo;
06176       else if( gMapInformation.sEastGridNo != -1 )
06177             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sEastGridNo;
06178       else if( gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo != -1 )
06179             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sSouthGridNo;
06180       else if( gMapInformation.sWestGridNo != -1 )
06181             sGridNo = gMapInformation.sWestGridNo;
06182       else
06183       {
06184             Assert(0);
06185             return;
06186       }
06187 
06188 
06189       sHeight = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
06190 
06191       if ( sHeight != sOldHeight )
06192       {
06193             gsRenderHeight = sHeight;
06194 
06195             if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
06196             {
06197                   gsRenderHeight += ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
06198             }
06199 
06200             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
06201             ErasePath(FALSE);
06202 
06203             sOldHeight = sHeight;
06204       }
06205 }
06206 
06207 BOOLEAN ValidQuickExchangePosition( )
06208 {
06209       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier, *pOverSoldier;
06210       INT16                                     sDistVisible = FALSE;
06211       BOOLEAN                                   fOnValidGuy = FALSE;
06212       static BOOLEAN          fOldOnValidGuy = FALSE;
06213 
06214       // Check if we over a civ
06215       if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
06216       {
06217             pOverSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusUIFullTargetID ];
06218 
06219             //KM: Replaced this older if statement for the new one which allows exchanging with militia
06220             //if ( ( pOverSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) && pOverSoldier->bNeutral  )
06221             if ( ( pOverSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && pOverSoldier->bNeutral ) || (pOverSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM && pOverSoldier->bSide == 0 ) )
06222             {
06223       // hehe - don't allow animals to exchange places
06224       if ( !( pOverSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_ANIMAL ) ) )
06225       {
06226                     // OK, we have a civ , now check if they are near selected guy.....
06227                     if ( GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier ) )
06228                     {
06229                           if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pOverSoldier->sGridNo ) == 1 )
06230                           {
06231                                 // Check if we have LOS to them....
06232                                 sDistVisible = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, pOverSoldier->sGridNo, pOverSoldier->bLevel, pOverSoldier );
06233 
06234                                 if ( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pOverSoldier->sGridNo,  pOverSoldier->bLevel, (UINT8)3, (UINT8) sDistVisible, TRUE ) )
06235                                 {
06236                                       // ATE:
06237                                       // Check that the path is good!
06238                                       if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, pOverSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_IGNORE_PERSON_AT_DEST ) == 1 )
06239                                       {
06240                                             fOnValidGuy = TRUE;
06241                                       }
06242                                 }
06243                           }
06244         }
06245                   }
06246             }
06247       }
06248 
06249       if ( fOldOnValidGuy != fOnValidGuy )
06250       {
06251             // Update timer....
06252             // ATE: Adjust clock for automatic swapping so that the 'feel' is there....
06253             guiUIInterfaceSwapCursorsTime = GetJA2Clock( );
06254             // Default it!
06255             gfOKForExchangeCursor = TRUE;
06256       }
06257 
06258       // Update old value.....
06259       fOldOnValidGuy = fOnValidGuy;
06260 
06261       if ( !gfOKForExchangeCursor )
06262       {
06263             fOnValidGuy = FALSE;
06264       }
06265 
06266       return( fOnValidGuy );
06267 }
06268 
06269 
06270 // This function contains the logic for allowing the player
06271 // to jump over people.
06272 BOOLEAN IsValidJumpLocation( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fCheckForPath )
06273 {
06274       INT16 sFourGrids[4], sDistance=0, sSpot, sIntSpot;
06275       INT16 sDirs[4] = { NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST };
06276       INT32 cnt;
06277       UINT8 ubGuyThere;
06278   UINT8 ubMovementCost;
06279   INT32 iDoorGridNo;
06280 
06281       // First check that action point cost is zero so far
06282       // ie: NO PATH!
06283       if ( gsCurrentActionPoints != 0 && fCheckForPath )
06284       {
06285             return( FALSE );
06286       }
06287 
06288       // Loop through positions...
06289       for (cnt = 0; cnt < 4; cnt++)
06290       {
06291             // MOVE OUT TWO DIRECTIONS
06292             sIntSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( sDirs[ cnt ] ) );
06293 
06294     // ATE: Check our movement costs for going through walls!
06295     ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ sIntSpot ][ sDirs[ cnt ] ][ pSoldier->bLevel ];
06296         if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
06297     {
06298               ubMovementCost = DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sIntSpot, ubMovementCost, (BOOLEAN) (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum), &iDoorGridNo );
06299         }
06300 
06301         // If we have hit an obstacle, STOP HERE
06302         if ( ubMovementCost >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
06303         {
06304       // no good, continue
06305       continue;
06306     }
06307 
06308 
06309             // TWICE AS FAR!
06310             sFourGrids[cnt] = sSpot = NewGridNo( sIntSpot, DirectionInc( sDirs[ cnt ] ) );
06311 
06312             // Is the soldier we're looking at here?
06313             ubGuyThere = WhoIsThere2( sSpot, pSoldier->bLevel );
06314             
06315             // Alright folks, here we are!
06316             if ( ubGuyThere == pSoldier->ubID )
06317             {
06318                   // Double check OK destination......
06319           if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel ) )
06320           {
06321                         // If the soldier in the middle of doing stuff?
06322                         if ( !pSoldier->fTurningUntilDone )
06323                         {
06324                               // OK, NOW check if there is a guy in between us
06325                               // 
06326                               // 
06327                               ubGuyThere = WhoIsThere2( sIntSpot, pSoldier->bLevel );
06328 
06329                               // Is there a guy and is he prone?
06330                               if ( ubGuyThere != NOBODY && ubGuyThere != pSoldier->ubID && gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[ ubGuyThere ]->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_PRONE )
06331                               {
06332                                     // It's a GO!
06333                                     return( TRUE );
06334                               }
06335                         }
06336                   }
06337             }
06338       }
06339 
06340       return( FALSE );
06341 }
